  7392                                  
  7393                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7394 00002269 50                      		push	ax
  7395 0000226A 51                      		push	cx
  7396 0000226B 52                      		push	dx
  7397 0000226C 55                      		push	bp
  7398 0000226D 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7399                                  loop_clock:				
  7400 0000226F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7401 00002271 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7402 00002273 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7403 00002275 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7404                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7405                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7406                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7407 00002277 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7408 0000227A 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7409 0000227C 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7410 0000227F 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7411 00002281 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7412 00002284 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7413 00002286 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7414 00002287 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7415                                  delay:					
  7416 0000228A E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7417 0000228C EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7419                                  
  7420                                  clock_present:				
  7421 0000228E 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7422 00002294 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7423                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7424                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7425 00002297 56                      		push	si
  7426 00002298 E88EF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7427 0000229B FA                      		cli
  7428                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7429 0000229C 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7430 000022A0 FB                      		sti
  7431 000022A1 5E                      		pop	si
  7432                                  
  7433                                  no_readdate:				
  7434 000022A2 5D                      		pop	bp
  7435 000022A3 5A                      		pop	dx
  7436 000022A4 59                      		pop	cx
  7437 000022A5 58                      		pop	ax
  7438 000022A6 C3                      		retn
  7439                                  
  7440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7441                                  
  7442                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7443                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7444                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7445                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7446                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7447                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7448                                  ;
  7449                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7450                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7451                                  ;
  7452                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7453                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7454                                  ;
  7455                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7456                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7457                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7458                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7459                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7460                                  ;
  7461                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7462                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7463                                  
  7464                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7465                                  
  7466                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7467                                  
  7468                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7469                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7470                                  			
  7471 000022A7 50                      		push	ax
  7472 000022A8 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7473 000022AE 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7474 000022B0 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7475                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7476 000022B6 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7477 000022B8 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7478                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7479 000022BE 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7480                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7481                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7482                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7483                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7484                                  cmosck4:				
  7485 000022C0 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7486                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7487 000022C2 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7488                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7489 000022C4 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7490 000022C7 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7491                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7492 000022C9 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7493 000022CC 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7494                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7495 000022CE 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7496 000022D0 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7497                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7498 000022D2 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7499                                  cmosck9:				
  7500 000022D5 58                      		pop	ax
  7501 000022D6 C3                      		retn
  7502                                  
  7503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7504                                  
  7505                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7506                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7507                                  ;									       :
  7508                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7509                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7510                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7511                                  ;									       :
  7512                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7513                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7514                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7515                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7516                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7517                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7518                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7519                                  
  7520                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7521 000022D7 9C                      		pushf
  7522 000022D8 FA                      		cli
  7523 000022D9 53                      		push	bx
  7524 000022DA 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7525 000022DB 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7526 000022DD E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7527                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7528 000022DF 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7529 000022E0 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7530 000022E2 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7531 000022E4 58                      		pop	ax
  7532 000022E5 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7533 000022E7 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7534 000022E9 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7535                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7536 000022EB 90                      		nop
  7537 000022EC E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7538 000022EE 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7539 000022F0 5B                      		pop	bx
  7540 000022F1 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7541 000022F2 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7542 000022F5 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7543                                  
  7544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7545                                  
  7546                                  cmos_popf:				
  7547 000022F6 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7548                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7549                                  
  7550                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7551                                  
  7552                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7553                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7554                                  ;									       :
  7555                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7556                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7557                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7558                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7559                                  ;									       :
  7560                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7561                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7562                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7563                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7564                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7565                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7566                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7567                                  
  7568                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7569 000022F7 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7570 000022F8 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7571 000022F9 FA                      		cli
  7572 000022FA 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7573 000022FB 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7574 000022FD E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7575                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7576 000022FF 90                      		nop
  7577 00002300 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7578 00002302 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7579 00002304 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7580 00002305 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7581 00002307 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7582 00002309 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7583                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7584 0000230B 90                      		nop
  7585 0000230C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7586 0000230E 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7587 0000230F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7588 00002310 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7589 00002313 C3                      		retn
  7590                                  
  7591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7592                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7594                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7596                                  
  7597                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7598                                  ;
  7599                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7600                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7601                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7602                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7603                                  
  7604                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7605                                  
  7606                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7607                                  ;
  7608                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7609                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7610                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7611                                  
  7612                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7613                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7614                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7615                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7616                                  
  7617                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7618                                  getclus:				
  7619 00002314 51                      		push	cx
  7620 00002315 57                      		push	di
  7621 00002316 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7622 0000231B 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7623 0000231D 48                      		dec	ax
  7624 0000231E 48                      		dec	ax
  7625 0000231F F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7626                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7627                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7628 00002321 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7629 00002326 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7630                                  unpack:					
  7631 0000232B 1E                      		push	ds
  7632 0000232C 50                      		push	ax
  7633 0000232D 53                      		push	bx
  7634 0000232E 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7635 00002333 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7636 00002335 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7637 00002337 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7638                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7639 0000233D 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7640 0000233F D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7641                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7642 00002341 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7643                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7644 00002343 52                      		push	dx
  7645 00002344 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7646 00002346 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7647 00002349 5A                      		pop	dx
  7648 0000234A 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7649 0000234C 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7650                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7651                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7652 0000234E 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7653 00002352 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7654 00002353 52                      		push	dx
  7655 00002354 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7656 00002356 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7657 00002359 5A                      		pop	dx
  7658                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7659 0000235A A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7660 0000235D 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7661 00002361 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7662                                  even_odd:				
  7663 00002365 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7664 00002366 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7665 00002367 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7666 00002369 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7667 0000236B D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7668                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7669 0000236D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7670 0000236F D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7671 00002371 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7672                                  havclus:				
  7673 00002373 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7674 00002375 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7675 00002379 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7677                                  
  7678                                  unpack16:				
  7679 0000237B 52                      		push	dx
  7680 0000237C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7681 0000237E D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7682 00002380 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7683 00002383 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7684 00002386 5A                      		pop	dx
  7685 00002387 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7686                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7687                                  unpackx:				
  7688 00002389 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7689 0000238A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7690 0000238B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7691 0000238C 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7692 0000238E 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7693 00002391 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7694 00002393 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7695 00002398 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7697                                  
  7698                                  getcl2:					
  7699 0000239A 53                      		push	bx
  7700 0000239B 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7701 0000239C 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7702 0000239D 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7703 000023A1 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7704 000023A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7705 000023A7 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7706                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7707 000023AC 1E                      		push	ds
  7708 000023AD 0E                      		push	cs
  7709 000023AE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7710 000023AF 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7711                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7712 000023B0 BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7713                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7714                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7715 000023B3 E8AFF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7716 000023B6 1F                      		pop	ds
  7717 000023B7 5B                      		pop	bx
  7718 000023B8 5F                      		pop	di
  7719 000023B9 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7720 000023BD 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7721 000023BF D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7722 000023C1 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7723 000023C3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7724 000023C4 C3                      		retn
  7725                                  
  7726                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7727                                  
  7728                                  
  7729                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7730                                  ;
  7731                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7732                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7733                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7734                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7735                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7736                                  ;
  7737                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7738                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7739                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7740                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7741                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7742                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7743                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7744                                  
  7745                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7746                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7747 000023C5 50                      		push	ax
  7748 000023C6 51                      		push	cx
  7749 000023C7 57                      		push	di
  7750 000023C8 56                      		push	si
  7751 000023C9 06                      		push	es
  7752 000023CA 1E                      		push	ds
  7753 000023CB 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7754 000023CD 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7755 000023D2 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7756 000023D4 90                      		nop
  7757                                  
  7758                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7759                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7760                                  
  7761 000023D5 06                      		push	es
  7762 000023D6 1E                      		push	ds
  7763 000023D7 57                      		push	di
  7764 000023D8 50                      		push	ax
  7765 000023D9 0E                      		push	cs
  7766 000023DA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7767                                  
  7768 000023DB 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7769 000023DF BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7770                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7771                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7772 000023E2 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7773 000023E3 E87FF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7774 000023E6 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7775 000023E7 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7776                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7777 000023EB 5F                      		pop	di
  7778 000023EC 1F                      		pop	ds
  7779 000023ED 07                      		pop	es
  7780 000023EE 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7781 000023F3 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7782 000023F5 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7783                                  					; sector number
  7784                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7785 000023F9 52                      		push	dx
  7786 000023FA 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7787                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7788                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7789 00002401 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7790 00002403 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7791 00002406 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7792 0000240A 1E                      		push	ds
  7793 0000240B 07                      		pop	es
  7794 0000240C 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7795 0000240E 1E                      		push	ds
  7796 0000240F 0E                      		push	cs
  7797 00002410 1F                      		pop	ds
  7798 00002411 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7799 00002412 BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7800                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7801                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7802 00002415 E84DF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7803 00002418 1F                      		pop	ds
  7804 00002419 5A                      		pop	dx
  7805 0000241A 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7806                                  
  7807                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7808 0000241F 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7809 00002420 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7810                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7811                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7812 00002422 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7813 00002424 1F                      		pop	ds
  7814 00002425 07                      		pop	es
  7815 00002426 5E                      		pop	si
  7816 00002427 5F                      		pop	di
  7817 00002428 59                      		pop	cx
  7818 00002429 58                      		pop	ax
  7819 0000242A C3                      		retn
  7820                                  
  7821                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7822                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7823                                  
  7824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7825                                  
  7826                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7827                                  		;db 0
  7828                                  
  7829                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7830                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7831                                  
  7832                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7833 0000242B 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7834                                  %endif
  7835                                  
  7836                                  ;align 16
  7837                                  
  7838                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7839                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7840                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7841                                  
  7842                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7844                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7845                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7846                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7847                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7848                                  
  7849                                  ;============================================================================
  7850                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7851                                  ;============================================================================
  7852                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7853                                  
  7854                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7855                                  
  7856                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7857                                   
  7858                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7859                                  
  7860                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7861                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7862                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7863                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7864                                  
  7865                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7866 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7867 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7868                                  
  7869                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7870                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7871                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7872                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7873                                  
  7874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7875                                  
  7876                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7877                                  
  7878                                  ;************************************************************************
  7879                                  ;*									*
  7880                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7881                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7882                                  ;*									*
  7883                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7884                                  ;*									*
  7885                                  ;************************************************************************
  7886                                  
  7887                                  _seg_reinit:
  7888 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7889                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7890                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7891 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7892 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7893                                  
  7894                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7895 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7896 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7897 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7898 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7899 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7900                                  
  7901                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7902                                  
  7903                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7904                                  
  7905                                  ;************************************************************************
  7906                                  ;*									*
  7907                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7908                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7909                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7910                                  ;*									*
  7911                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7912                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7913                                  ;*									*
  7914                                  ;************************************************************************
  7915                                  
  7916                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7917 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7918 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7919 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7920 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7921 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7922 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7923 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7924 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7925 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7926 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7927 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7928                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7929                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7930 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7931 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7932 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7933 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7934 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7935 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7936 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7937 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7938 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7939 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7940                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7941 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7942                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7943                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7944 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7947                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7948                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7949                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7950                                  ;
  7951                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7952                                  ;
  7953                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7954                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7955                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7956                                  ;
  7957                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7958                                  
  7959                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7960 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7961 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7962 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7963 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7964                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7965                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7966 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7967 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7968                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7969                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7970 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7971 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7972 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7973 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7974 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7975 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7976 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7977 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7978 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7979 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7980                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7981 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7982                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7983 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7984 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7985                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7986                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7987                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7988                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7989 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7990                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7991 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7992 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7993                                  					; mark operation complete
  7994 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7995 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7996 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7997 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7998 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7999 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8000 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8001 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8002 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8003 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8004                                  	
  8005                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8007                                  bc_retf:
  8008 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8010                                  
  8011                                  command_error:				
  8012 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8013 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8014                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8015                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8016                                  
  8017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8018                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8019                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8020                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8021                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8022                                  ; high.
  8023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8024                                  
  8025                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8026                                  
  8027                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8028                                  
  8029 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8030                                  
  8031 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8032                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8033                                  		
  8034                                  
  8035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8036                                  
  8037                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8038                                  
  8039                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8040 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8041                                  					; unknown command error
  8042                                  
  8043                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8044                                  
  8045                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8046                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8047                                  
  8048                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8049                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8050                                  
  8051                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8052                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8053                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8054 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8055 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8056                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8057 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8058 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8059 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8060                                  
  8061                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8062                                  
  8063                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8064                                  
  8065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8066                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8068                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8069                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8070                                  
  8071                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8072                                  
  8073                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8074                                  
  8075                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8076                                  
  8077                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8078                                  
  8079                                  ;************************************************************************
  8080                                  ;*									*
  8081                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8082                                  ;*									*
  8083                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8084                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8085                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8086                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8087                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8088                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8089                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8090                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8091                                  ;*									*
  8092                                  ;************************************************************************
  8093                                  
  8094                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8095                                  		;db 0
  8096                                  
  8097                                  		; 13/12/202
  8098 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8099                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8100 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8101                                  					; 00 init
  8102 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8103 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8104 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8105                                  					; 03
  8106 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8107                                  					; 04
  8108 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8109                                  					; 05
  8110 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8111 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8112                                  					; 07
  8113 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8114                                  					; 08
  8115 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8116 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8117                                  con_table_end:
  8118 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8119                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8120 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8121 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8122 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8123 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8124 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8125                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8126 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8127                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8128 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8129 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8130 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8131 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8132 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8133 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8134 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8135 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8136 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8137 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8138 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8139 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8140 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8141 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8142 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8143 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8144 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8145 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8146 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8147 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8148                                  prn_table_end:
  8149 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8150                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8151 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8152 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8153 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8154 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8155 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8156 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8157 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8158 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8159 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8160 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8161 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8162                                  aux_table_end:
  8163 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8164                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8165 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8166 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8167 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8168 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8169 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8170 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8171 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8172 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8173 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8174 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8175                                  tim_table_end:
  8176                                  
  8177                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8178                                  
  8179                                  ;************************************************************************
  8180                                  ;*									*
  8181                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8182                                  ;*									*
  8183                                  ;************************************************************************
  8184                                  
  8185                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8186                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8187 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8188                                  con_loop:				
  8189 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8190 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8191 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8192                                  con_exit:				
  8193 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8194 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8195                                  
  8196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8197                                  
  8198                                  ;************************************************************************
  8199                                  ;*									*
  8200                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8201                                  ;*									*
  8202                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8203                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8204                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8205                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8206                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8207                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8208                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8209                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8210                                  ;*									*
  8211                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8212                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8213                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8214                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8215                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8216                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8219                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8220                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8221                                  ;*									*
  8222                                  ;************************************************************************
  8223                                  
  8224                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8225                                  chrin:		
  8226 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8227 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8228 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8229 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8230 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8231 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8232 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8233 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8234 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8235 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8236 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8237 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8239                                  
  8240                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8241                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8242                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8243                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8244                                  ;      else
  8245                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8246                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8247                                  ;      endif
  8248                                  ;    endif
  8249                                  ;  endif
  8250                                  
  8251                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8252 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8253 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8254 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8255 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8256 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8257 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8258 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8259 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8260                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8261                                  
  8262                                  not_ext:				
  8263 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8264 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8265                                  alt_save:				
  8266 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8267                                  keyret:					
  8268 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8269                                  
  8270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8271                                  
  8272                                  ;************************************************************************
  8273                                  ;*									*
  8274                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8275                                  ;*									*
  8276                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8277                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8278                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8279                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8280                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8281                                  ;*									*
  8282                                  ;************************************************************************
  8283                                  
  8284                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8285                                  con_rdnd:				
  8286 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8287 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8288 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8289 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8290 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8291 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8292 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8293 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8294 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8295                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8296 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8297                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8298 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8299 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8300 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8301 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8302                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8303                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8304                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8305                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8306 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8307 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8308 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8310                                  
  8311                                  gotchr:					
  8312 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8313 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8314 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8315 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8316 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8318                                  
  8319                                  notbrk:					
  8320 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8321 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8322 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8323 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8325                                  
  8326                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8327 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8328 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8329 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8330 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8331 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8332 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8333 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8334                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8335                                  rdexit:					
  8336 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8337 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8338                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8339                                  bc_exvec:				
  8340 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8341                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8342 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8344                                  
  8345                                  ;************************************************************************
  8346                                  ;*									*
  8347                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8348                                  ;*									*
  8349                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8350                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8351                                  ;*									*
  8352                                  ;************************************************************************
  8353                                  
  8354                                  con_writ:
  8355                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8356 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8357                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8358                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8359                                  con_lp:					
  8360 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8361 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8362 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8363                                  					; AL = character to display
  8364 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8365                                  cc_ret:					
  8366 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8367 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8368                                  
  8369                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8370                                  
  8371                                  ;************************************************************************
  8372                                  ;*									*
  8373                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8374                                  ;*									*
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  
  8377                                  con_flush:
  8378 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8379                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8380 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8381 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8382                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8383                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8384                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8385 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8386 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8387 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8388                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8389 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8394                                  
  8395                                  ;************************************************************************
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8398                                  ;*									*
  8399                                  ;************************************************************************
  8400                                  
  8401                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8402                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8403                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8404                                  
  8405                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8406                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8407                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8408                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8409                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8410                                  ;
  8411                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8412                                  
  8413                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8414                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8415                                  
  8416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8417                                  
  8418                                  ;************************************************************************
  8419                                  ;*									*
  8420                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8421                                  ;*									*
  8422                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8423                                  ;*									*
  8424                                  ;************************************************************************
  8425                                  
  8426                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8427 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8428                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8429                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8430                                  prn_done:
  8431 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8432 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8433                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8434                                  
  8435                                  ;************************************************************************
  8436                                  ;*									*
  8437                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8438                                  ;*									*
  8439                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8440                                  ;*									*
  8441                                  ;************************************************************************
  8442                                  
  8443                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8444                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8445 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8446                                  prn_loop:				
  8447 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8448                                  prn_out:				
  8449 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8450 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8451 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8452 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8453 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8454 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8455 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8456 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8457 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8458 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8459 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8461                                  
  8462                                  _prnwf:					
  8463 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8464 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8465                                  TestPrnError:				
  8466 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8467 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8468                                  pmessg:					
  8469 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8471                                  
  8472                                  prn_con:
