  8474 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8475                                  ;prn_done:				
  8476                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8477                                  prn_done2:
  8478                                  		;clc
  8479                                  		; cf=0
  8480 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8482                                  
  8483                                  ;************************************************************************
  8484                                  ;*									*
  8485                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8486                                  ;*									*
  8487                                  ;************************************************************************
  8488                                  
  8489                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8490 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8491 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8492 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8493                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8494                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8495 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8496 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8498                                  
  8499                                  ;************************************************************************
  8500                                  ;*									*
  8501                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8502                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8503                                  ;*									*
  8504                                  ;************************************************************************
  8505                                  
  8506                                  prnstat:				
  8507 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8508                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8509                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8510                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8511                                  
  8512                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8513                                  
  8514                                  ;************************************************************************
  8515                                  ;*									*
  8516                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8517                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8518                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8519                                  ;*									*
  8520                                  ;************************************************************************
  8521                                  
  8522                                  prnop:	
  8523 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8524 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8525                                  
  8526                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8527                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8528                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8529                                  
  8530 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8531 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8532 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8533 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8534 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8535 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8536 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8537                                  
  8538                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8539                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8540                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8541                                  
  8542                                  NextTest:				
  8543 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8544                                  					; i/o error?
  8545 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8546                                  
  8547                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8548                                  
  8549 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8550                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8551 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8552 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8553 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8554                                  ret1:					
  8555 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8557                                  
  8558                                  checknotready:				
  8559 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8560 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8561 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8562                                  
  8563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8564                                  
  8565                                  ;************************************************************************
  8566                                  ;*									*
  8567                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8568                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8569                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8570                                  ;*									*
  8571                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8572                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8573                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8574                                  ;*									*
  8575                                  ;************************************************************************
  8576                                  
  8577                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8578                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8579 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8580                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8581 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8582 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8583 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8584 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8585 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8586                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8587 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8588 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8589                                  prn_getstat:				
  8590 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8591 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8592 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8593 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8594 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8595 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8596 000002A6 26                      		es
  8597 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8598                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8599                                  					; lodsb
  8600 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8601 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8602 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8603 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8604                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8605                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8606                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8607 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8608                                  
  8609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8610                                  
  8611                                  prn_bperr:				
  8612 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8613                                  prn_berr:				
  8614 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8615                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8616                                  
  8617                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8618                                  
  8619                                  ;************************************************************************
  8620                                  ;*									*
  8621                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8622                                  ;*									*
  8623                                  ;************************************************************************
  8624                                  
  8625                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8626                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8627                                  
  8628                                  ;********************************;*
  8629                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8630                                  ;********************************;*
  8631                                  
  8632                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8633                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8634                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8635                                  
  8636                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8637                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8638                                  ;;endstruc
  8639                                  
  8640                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8641                                  
  8642                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8643                                  
  8644                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8645                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8646 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8647 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8648                                  					; ioc_pc
  8649 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8650                                  
  8651                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8652 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8654                                  
  8655                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8656 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8657 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8658 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8659                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8660 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8661 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8662                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8663 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8664 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8665 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8666 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8667 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8668 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8669                                  prngetcount:				
  8670                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8671 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8672 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8673                                  					; return current retry count
  8674                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8675                                  		; cf=0
  8676                                  		;clc
  8677 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8678                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8679                                  
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8683                                  ;*									*
  8684                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8685                                  ;************************************************************************
  8686                                  
  8687                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8688 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8689 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8690                                  					; ioc_pc

  8693 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8694 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported

  8706                                  		;stc
  8707 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8709                                  
  8710                                  ;************************************************************************
  8711                                  ;*									*
  8712                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8715                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8716                                  ;*									*
  8717                                  ;************************************************************************
  8718                                  
  8719                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8720                                  
  8721                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8722                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8723                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8724                                  
  8725                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8726                                  
  8727                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8728                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8729                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8730                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8731                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8732                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8733                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8734                                  
  8735                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8736                                  
  8737                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8738                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8739                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8740                                  
  8741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8742                                  
  8743                                  ;************************************************************************
  8744                                  ;*									*
  8745                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8746                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8747                                  ;*									*
  8748                                  ;************************************************************************
  8749                                  
  8750                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8751                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8752 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8753 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8754 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8755 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8756 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8757 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8758                                  aux1:					
  8759 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8760                                  					; won't return if error
  8761                                  aux2:					
  8762 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8763 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8764                                  exvec2:					
  8765 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8766                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8767 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8769                                  
  8770                                  ;************************************************************************
  8771                                  ;*									*
  8772                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8773                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8774                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8775                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8776                                  ;*									*
  8777                                  ;************************************************************************
  8778                                  
  8779                                  auxin:					
  8780 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8781 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8782 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8783                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8784                                  		;retn
  8785                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8786 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8788                                  
  8789                                  arbad:					
  8790 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8791 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8792 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8793 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8794                                  
  8795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8796                                  
  8797                                  ;************************************************************************
  8798                                  ;*									*
  8799                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8800                                  ;*									*
  8801                                  ;************************************************************************
  8802                                  
  8803                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8804 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8805 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8806 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8807 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8808 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8809 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8810 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8811 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8812 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8813 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8814 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8815                                  auxdrx:					
  8816 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8817                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8818                                  
  8819                                  auxbus:					
  8820 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8822                                  
  8823                                  ;************************************************************************
  8824                                  ;*									*
  8825                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8826                                  ;*									*
  8827                                  ;************************************************************************
  8828                                  
  8829                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8830 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8831 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8832 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8833 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8834 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8835                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8836                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8837                                  		;clc
  8838 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8839                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8840                                  
  8841                                  ;************************************************************************
  8842                                  ;*									*
  8843                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8844                                  ;*									*
  8845                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8846                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8847                                  ;*									*
  8848                                  ;************************************************************************
  8849                                  
  8850                                  auxstat:				
  8851 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8852                                  
  8853                                  		; fall into auxop
  8854                                  
  8855                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8856                                  
  8857                                  ;************************************************************************
  8858                                  ;*									*
  8859                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8860                                  ;*									*
  8861                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8862                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8863                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8864                                  ;*									*
  8865                                  ;************************************************************************
  8866                                  
  8867                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8868 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8869                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8870                                  					; get port number
  8871 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8872                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8873                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8874 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8875                                  
  8876                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8877                                  
  8878                                  ;************************************************************************
  8879                                  ;*									*
  8880                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8881                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8882                                  ;*									*
  8883                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8884                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8885                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8886                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8887                                  ;*									*
  8888                                  ;************************************************************************
  8889                                  
  8890                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8891 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8892 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8893                                  					; zero out buffer
  8894                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8895                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8896                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8897 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8898                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8899                                  
  8900                                  ;************************************************************************
  8901                                  ;*									*
  8902                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8903                                  ;*									*
  8904                                  ;************************************************************************
  8905                                  
  8906                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8907                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8908 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8909                                  aux_loop:				
  8910 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8911                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8912 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8913 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8914 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8915 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8916 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8917 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8918 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8920                                  
  8921                                  awok:					
  8922 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8923                                  					; still	more character to print
  8924                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8925                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8926                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8927 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8928                                  
  8929                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8930                                  
  8931                                  ;************************************************************************
  8932                                  ;*									*
  8933                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8934                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8935                                  ;*									*
  8936                                  ;************************************************************************
  8937                                  
  8938                                  getbx:	
  8939 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8940                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8941                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8942 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8943                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8944                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8945 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8946                                  
  8947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8948                                  
  8949                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8950                                  
  8951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8952                                  ;								:
  8953                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8954                                  ;								:
  8955                                  ;								:
  8956                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8957                                  ;								:
  8958                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8959                                  ;								:
  8960                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8961                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8962                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8963                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8964                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8965                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8966                                  ;								:
  8967                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8968                                  ;								:
  8969                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8970                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8971                                  ;								:
  8972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8973                                  
  8974                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8975                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8976                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8977                                  
  8978                                  ;19/07/2019
  8979                                  ;09/03/2019
  8980                                  
  8981                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8982                                  
  8983                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8984                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8985                                  
  8986 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8987 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8988 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8989 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8990 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8991 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8992 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8993 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8994 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8995 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8996 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8997 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8998 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8999 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9000 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9001                                  
  9002                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9003                                  
  9004 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9005 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9006 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9007 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9008 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9009 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9010 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9011 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9012 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9013 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9014 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9015 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9016 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9017 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9018 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9019 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  9020 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9021 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9022 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9023 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  9024                                  
  9025                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9026                                  
  9027                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9028                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9029                                  
  9030                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9031                                  ;
  9032                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9033                                  ;
  9034                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9035                                  ;
  9036                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9037                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9038                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9039                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9040                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9041                                  ;
  9042                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9043                                  ;
  9044                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9045                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9046                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9047                                  ;
  9048                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9049                                  
  9050                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9051 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9052 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9053                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9054 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9055                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9056 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9057 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9058                                  					; get binary hours
  9059                                  					; convert to bcd
  9060 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9061                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9062 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9063 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9064 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9065                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9066 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9067 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9068 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9069                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  9070 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9071 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9072 000003FB FA                      		cli
  9073 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9074 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9075                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9076                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9077                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9078 00000400 FB                      		sti
  9079                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9080 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9081 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9082                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9083 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9084                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9085                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9086                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9087 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9088 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9089 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9090                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9091                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9092                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9093 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9094 00000416 FB                      		sti
  9095                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9096 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9097 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9098 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  9099                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9100                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9101 00000422 FA                      		cli
  9102 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9103 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9104                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9105                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9106                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9107 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9108                                  no_cmos_2:
  9109                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9110                                  		; cf=0				
  9111                                  		;clc
  9112 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9113                                  
  9114                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9115                                  
  9116                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9117                                  
  9118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9119                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9120                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9121                                  ;
  9122                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9123                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9124                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9125                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9126                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9127                                  ;
  9128                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9129                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9130                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9132                                  
  9133                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9134 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9135 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9136                                  
  9137                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9138                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9139                                  ;
  9140                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9141                                  ;	       ----------------
  9142                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9143                                  ;
  9144                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9145                                  ;
  9146                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9147                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9148                                  ;		1,193,180
  9149                                  ;
  9150                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9151                                  ;
  9152                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9153                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9154                                  ;		59,659
  9155                                  ;
  9156                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9157                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9158                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9159                                  ;
  9160                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9161                                  ; multiply by 5
  9162                                  
  9163 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9164 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9165                                  					; multiply by 5
  9166 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9167 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9168 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9169 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9170 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9171 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9172 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9173                                  
  9174                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9175                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9176                                  
  9177 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9178 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9179                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9180 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9181 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9182 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9183                                  
  9184                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9185                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9186                                  
  9187 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9188 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9189                                  
  9190                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9191                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9192                                  
  9193 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9194 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9195 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9196 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9197                                  noadj:					
  9198 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9199 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9200                                  
  9201                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9202                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9203                                  
  9204 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9205 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9206 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9207 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9208 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9209 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9210 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9211 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9212                                  
  9213                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9214                                  
  9215 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9216 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9217 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9218 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9219 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9220 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9221 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9222 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9223 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9224                                  
  9225                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9226                                  
  9227                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9228                                  
  9229                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9230                                  ;
  9231                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9232                                  ;
  9233                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9234                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9235                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9236                                  ;
  9237                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9238                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9239                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9240                                  ;			else
  9241                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9242                                  ;		}
  9243                                  ;
  9244                                  ; USES : AX
  9245                                  ;
  9246                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9247                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9248                                  ;
  9249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9250                                  
  9251                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9252                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9253 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9254 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9255                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9256                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9257                                  					; midnight
  9258                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9259 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9260 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9261 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9262                                  					; and not flag
  9263 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9264 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9265                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9266                                  
  9267                                  inc_case:				
  9268 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9269 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9270 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9271                                  no_rollover:				
  9272 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9273

  9276                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9278                                  ; 09/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9279

  9281                                  ; 26/05/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  9282                                  ; 23/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
  9283

  9300                                  
  9301                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9302                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9303                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9304                                  
  9305                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9306                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9307                                  
  9308                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9309                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9310                                  
  9311                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9312                                  
  9313                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9314                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9315                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9316                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9317                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9318                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9319                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9320                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9321                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9322                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9323                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9324                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9325                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9326                                  
  9327                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9328                                  
  9329                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9330                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9331                                  ;
  9332                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9333                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9334                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9335                                  ;   else
  9336                                  ;	set slow = value
  9337                                  ;   ...
  9338                                  ;*********************************************
  9339                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9340                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9341                                  ;*	 use slow
  9342                                  ;*   else
  9343                                  ;*	 use fast
  9344                                  ;*********************************************
  9345                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9346                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9347                                  ;	use slow
  9348                                  ;   else
  9349                                  ;	use fast
  9350                                  ;   ...
  9351                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9352                                  ;
  9353                                  ;
  9354                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9355                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9356                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9357                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9358                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9359                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9360                                  
  9361                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9362                                  
  9363                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9364                                  
  9365                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9366                                  
  9367                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9368                                  ;	command jump table
  9369                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9370                                  
  9371 00000495 00                      		db 0
  9372                                  
  9373                                  ; 11/12/2022
  9374                                  %if 0
  9375                                  
  9376                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  9377                                  					; ((dtbl_siz-1)/2) ; this is the size of the table ; 26
  9378                                  		dw 1742h		; dsk_init

  9441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9442                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9443                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9444                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9445                                  ;
  9446                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9448                                  
  9449                                  SetDrive:	
  9450                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9451 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9452                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9453 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9454 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9455 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9456 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9457 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9458 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9459                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9460 000004DE C3                      		retn

  9462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9463                                  
  9464                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9465                                  
  9466                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9467                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9468                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9469                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9470                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9471                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9472                                  
  9473                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh

  9476 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9477                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9478 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9479                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9480 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format

  9482                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag

  9484                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9485 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9486                                  					; fnon_removable
  9487 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9488 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9489 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9491                                  
  9492                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9493                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9494 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9495 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9496                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9497 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9498                                  
  9499                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9500                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9501                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9502

  9506 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj

  9551                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9552                                  
  9553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9554                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9555                                  ; drive.
  9556                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9557                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9558                                  ; returns in si:
  9559                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9560                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9561                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9562                                  ;
  9563                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9564                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9565                                  
  9566                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9567                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9568 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9569 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9570 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9571                                  					; get stored time
  9572 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9573 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9574 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9575 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9576 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9577 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9578 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9579 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9580                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9581 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9582 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9583 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9585                                  
  9586                                  timepassed:				
  9587 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9588                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9589 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9590                                  
  9591                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9592                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9593 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9594                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9595 00000582 C3                      		retn

  9672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------
  9673                                  ; clear ids in bds table. only applied for floppies.

  9679                                  ;	   depending on the flag fatsize in bds.

  9725                                  
  9726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9727                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
  9728                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
  9729                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
  9730                                  ;	    for all other cases,
  9731                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
  9732                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
  9733                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
  9734                                  ;
  9735                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
  9736                                  ;
  9737                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
  9738                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
  9739                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
  9740                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
  9741                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
  9742                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
  9743                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
  9744                                  ;
  9745                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
  9746                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
  9747                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
  9748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9749                                  
  9750                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
  9751                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable		
  9752 000005F7 26F6452305              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 5
  9753 000005FC 7403                    		jz	short getbp1	; getbp1
  9754 000005FE E99500                  		jmp	getret_exit
  9755                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9756                                  
  9757                                  getbp1:					
  9758 00000601 51                      		push	cx
  9759 00000602 52                      		push	dx
  9760 00000603 53                      		push	bx
  9761                                  
  9762                                  		; attempt to read in boot sector and determine bpb.
  9763                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
  9764                                  		; have a valid boot sector.
  9765                                  
  9766 00000604 E8A400                  		call	readbootsec
  9767 00000607 7209                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg ; carry set if there was error.
  9768 00000609 09DB                    		or	bx, bx		; bx is	0 if boot sector is valid.
  9769 0000060B 7508                    		jnz	short dofatbpb
  9770 0000060D E8F000                  		call	movbpb		; move bpb into	registers
  9771 00000610 EB57                    		jmp	short Has1
  9772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9773                                  
  9774                                  getbp_err_ret_brdg:			
  9775 00000612 E98200                  		jmp	getbp_err_ret
  9776                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9777                                  
  9778                                  		; we have a 1.x diskette. In this case read in the fat ID byte
  9779                                  		; and fill in bpb from there.
  9780                                  dofatbpb:				
  9781 00000615 E85401                  		call	readfat		; puts media descriptor	byte in	ah
  9782 00000618 72F8                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg
  9783                                  		;cmp	ds:fhave96, 0	;  changeline support available?
  9784 0000061A 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; 19/10/2022
