 12191                                  
 12192                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12193                                  
 12194                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12195                                  ;
 12196                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12197                                  ;
 12198                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12199                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12200                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12201                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12202                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12203                                  ;
 12204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12205                                  
 12206                                  ResetDisk:	
 12207 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12208 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12209                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12210 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12211                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12212 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12213                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12214 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12215 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12216                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12217 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12218                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12219 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12220 00001092 C3                      		retn
 12221                                  
 12222                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12223                                  
 12224                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12225                                  
 12226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12227                                  ;
 12228                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12229                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12230                                  ;
 12231                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12232                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12233                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12234                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12235                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12236                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12237                                  ;
 12238                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12239                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12240                                  ;
 12241                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12242                                  
 12243                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12244                                  ToRom:	
 12245 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12246 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12247                                  
 12248                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12249                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12250                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12251                                  
 12252 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12253 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12254 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12255 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12256 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12257                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12258 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12259 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12260                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12261 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12262                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12263                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12264 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12265 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12266                                  		
 12267 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12268 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12269 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12270 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12271                                  					; Important for	format
 12272 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12273                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12274                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12275 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12276 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12277 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12278                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12279 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12280 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12281                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12282 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12283 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12284 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12285 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12286 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12287 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12288 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12289 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12290 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12291 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12292 000010EA C3                      		retn
 12293                                  
 12294                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12295                                  
 12296                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12297                                  
 12298                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12299                                  
 12300                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12301                                  ;
 12302                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12303                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12304                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12305                                  ;
 12306                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12307                                  
 12308                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12309                                  ioctl_getown:
 12310 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12311 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12312                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12313 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12314                                  ownloop:				
 12315 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12316 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12317                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12318 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12319                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12320                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12321 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12322                                  getnextBDS:				
 12323 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12324 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12326                                  
 12327                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12328                                  ;
 12329                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12330                                  ; in al to al.
 12331                                  ;
 12332                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12333                                  
 12334                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12335                                  ioctl_setown:
 12336 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive

 12423                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12424                                  ;	get media id
 12425                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12426                                  ;
 12427                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12428                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12429                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12430                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12431                                  ;
 12432                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12433                                  ;
 12434                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12435                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12436                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12437                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12438                                  ;
 12439                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12440                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12441                                  ;
 12442                                  ; LOGIC:
 12443                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12444                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12445                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12446                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12447                                  ;
 12448                                  ; {
 12449                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12450                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12451                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12452                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12453                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12454                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12455                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12456                                  ;		};
 12457                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12458                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12459                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12460                                  ;		};
 12461                                  ;	else
 12462                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12463                                  ;
 12464                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12465                                  
 12466                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12467                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12468                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12469                                  
 12470                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12471                                  GetMediaId:
 12472 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12473 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12474 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12475 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12476 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12477                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12478 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12479                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12480 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12481                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12482 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12483 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12484                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12485                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12486 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12487 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12488 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12489                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12490 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12491                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12492                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12493 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12494 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12495                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12496                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12497 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12498                                  	
 12499                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12500                                  		; cf = 0
 12501                                  		;clc
 12502                                  
 12503 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12505                                  
 12506                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12507 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12508 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12509                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12510 00001192 C3                      		retn

 12512                                  
 12513                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12514                                  
 12515                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12516                                  ;  set media id
 12517                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12518                                  
 12519                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12520                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12521                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12522                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12523                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12524                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12525                                  ;
 12526                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12527                                  ;
 12528                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12529                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12530                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12531                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12532                                  ;
 12533                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12534                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12535                                  ;
 12536                                  ; logic:
 12537                                  ;
 12538                                  ; {
 12539                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12540                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12541                                  ;	BootIo;
 12542                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12543                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12544                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12545                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12546                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12547                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12548                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12549                                  ;		};
 12550                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12551                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12552                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12553                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12554                                  ;		};
 12555                                  ;	else
 12556                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12557                                  ;
 12558                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12559                                  
 12560                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12561                                  SetMediaId:
 12562 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12563 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12564                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12565 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12566 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12567 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12568 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12569 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12570 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12571                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12572 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12573                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12574 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12575 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12576                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12577 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12578 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12579 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12580 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12581 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12582 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12583 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12584 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12585 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12586 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12587                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12588                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12589 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12590 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12591 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12592 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12593 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12594 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12595 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12596 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12597 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12598 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12599                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12600                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12601 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12603                                  
 12604                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12605 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12606 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12607                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12608 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12609                                  
 12610                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12611                                  
 12612                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12613                                  
 12614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12615                                  ;	BootIo
 12616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12617                                  ;
 12618                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12619                                  ;
 12620                                  ; input :
 12621                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12622                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12623                                  ;
 12624                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12625                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12626                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12627                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12628                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12629                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12630                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12631                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12632                                  ;
 12633                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12634                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12635                                  ;
 12636                                  ; logic:
 12637                                  ;
 12638                                  ; {
 12639                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12640                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12641                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12642                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12643                                  ; }
 12644                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12645                                  
 12646                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12647                                  BootIo:	
 12648 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12649 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12650 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12651 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12652 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12653                                  
 12654                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12655                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12656                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12657                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12658                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12659                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12660                                  
 12661 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12662 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12663 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12664 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12665 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12666 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12667 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12668 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12669 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12670                                  
 12671                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12672                                  
 12673                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12674                                  
 12675                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12676                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12678                                  ;
 12679                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12680                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12681                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12682                                  ; history in the flags.
 12683                                  ;
 12684                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12685                                  ;
 12686                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12687                                  ;
 12688                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12689                                  ;
 12690                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12691                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12692                                  ;
 12693                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12694                                  
 12695                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12696 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12697 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12698 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12699                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12700 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12701                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12702                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12703 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12704 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12705 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12706 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12707 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12708                                  
 12709                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12710                                  
 12711 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12712 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12713                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12714                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12715 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12716 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12717 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12718                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12719                                  					; physical drive
 12720 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12721 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12722                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12723 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12724                                  
 12725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12726                                  
 12727                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12728                                  
 12729                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12730                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12731                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12732                                  ;
 12733                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12734                                  ;
 12735                                  ; INPUT :
 12736                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12737                                  ;
 12738                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12739                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12740                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12741                                  
 12742                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12743                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12744 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12745 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12746                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12747                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12748 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12749                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12750 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12751                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12752                                  					; unformatted_media
 12753 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12754 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12755                                  
 12756                                  GafDone:				
 12757 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12758 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12759                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12760                                  
 12761                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12762                                  
 12763                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12764                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12765                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12766                                  ;
 12767                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12768                                  ;
 12769                                  ; input :
 12770                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12771                                  ;
 12772                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12773                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12774                                  
 12775                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12776                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12777 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12778 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12779                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12780 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12781                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12782                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12783 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12784 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12785                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12786 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12787                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12788                                  					; unformatted_media
 12789                                  saf_Done:				
 12790 00001256 C3                      		retn

 12792                                  
 12793                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12794                                  
 12795                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12796                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12797                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12798                                  ;
 12799                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12800                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12801                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12802                                  ;
 12803                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12804                                  
 12805                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12806                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12807 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12808 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12809 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12810                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12811 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12812                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12813 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12814 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12815 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12816 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12817                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12818 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12819                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12820                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12821 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12822 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12823 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found

 12827                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12828                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12829                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12830                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12831                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12832 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12833                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12834                                  		; cf = 0
 12835                                  		;clc
 12836 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12838                                  nosupport:				
 12839 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12840 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12841                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12842                                  
 12843                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12844                                  
 12845                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12846                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12847                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12848                                  ;
 12849                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12850                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12851                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12852                                  ;	    drive)
 12853                                  ;
 12854                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12855                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12856                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12857                                  ;
 12858                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12859                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12860                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12861                                  ;
 12862                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12863                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12864                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12865                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12866                                  ;
 12867                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12868                                  ;
 12869                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12870                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12871                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12872                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12873                                  ; 
 12874                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12875                                  
 12876                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12877                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12878 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12879 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12880                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12881                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12882 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12883 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12884                                  		;
 12885 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12886                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12887                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12888                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12889 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12890                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12891 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12892 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12893 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12894                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12895 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12896 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12897 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12898 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12899 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12900 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12901 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12902 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12903                                  GotMediaType:				
 12904 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12905                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12906                                  		; cf = 0
 12907                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12908 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12910                                  
 12911                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12912 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12913 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12914 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12915 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12916 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12917                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12918 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12919                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12920 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12921 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12922 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12923                                  
 12924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12925                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12926                                  		;db    0
 12927                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12928                                  
 12929                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12930                                  
 12931                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12932                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12933                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12934                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12935                                  
 12936                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12937                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12938                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12939                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12940                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12941                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12942                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12943                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12944                                  ;
 12945                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12946                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12947                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12948                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12949                                  ;
 12950                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12951                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12952                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12953                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12954                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12955                                  ;
 12956                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12957                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12958                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12959                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12960                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12961                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12962                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12963                                  
 12964                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12965                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12966                                  
 12967                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12968                                  
 12969                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12970 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12971 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12972 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12973 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12974                                  
 12975                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12976                                  
 12977 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12978 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12979 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12980 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12981 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12983                                  
 12984                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12985 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12987                                  
 12988                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12989 000012D0 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12990 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12991                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12992                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12993                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12994 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12995                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12996                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12997                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12998                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12999                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13000 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13001 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13002 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13003 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13004                                  
 13005                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13006                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13007                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13008                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13009 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 13010 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13011 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 13012 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13013                                  
 13014 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13015 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 13016 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13017 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 13018 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 13019                                  i2f_iret:				
 13020 000012FC CF                      		iret
 13021                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13022                                  
 13023                                  mine:

 13025 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13026 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13027 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func

 13077                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13078 00001335 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13079                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13080 0000133A C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13081                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13082                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022				
 13083 0000133E EBBC                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
