 14239                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14240                                  
 14241                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14242                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14243                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14244                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14245                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14246                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14247                                  
 14248                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14249 0000176E 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14250 00001770 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14250 00001779 736B6574746520666F-
 14250 00001782 7220647269766520   
 14251                                  
 14252                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14253 0000178A 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14253 00001793 65737320616E79206B-
 14253 0000179C 6579207768656E2072-
 14253 000017A5 656164790D0A       
 14254 000017AB 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14255                                  
 14256                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14257                                  
 14258                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14259                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14260                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14261                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14262                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14263                                  
 14264                                  chkopcnt:		
 14265 000017AD 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14266 000017B2 C3                      		retn
 14267                                  
 14268                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14269                                  
 14270                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14271                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14272                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14273                                  ;
 14274                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14275                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14276                                  
 14277                                  mediacheck:	
 14278 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14279 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14280 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14281 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14282 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14283 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14284 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14285 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14286 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14287                                  					; set logical drive number
 14288 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14289 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14290                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14291                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14292 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14293 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14294 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14295 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14296                                  
 14297                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14298                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14299                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14300                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14301                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14302                                  ; status.
 14303                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14304 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14305 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14306                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14307                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14308                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14309                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14310 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14311                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14312                                  
 14313                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14314                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14315                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14316                                  
 14317 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14318 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14319 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14320 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14321 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14322 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14323 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14324 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14325 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14326                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14327 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14328                                  mediaret:				
 14329 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14330                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14331                                  
 14332                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14333                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14334                                  ; or write.
 14335                                  
 14336                                  mediadovolid:				
 14337 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14338 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14339 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14340 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14341 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14343                                  
 14344                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14345                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14346                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14347                                  ; dos.
 14348                                  ;
 14349                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14350                                  
 14351                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14352                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14353                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14354                                  
 14355                                  checklatchio:	
 14356                                  
 14357                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14358                                  			
 14359 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14360 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14361                                  
 14362                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14363                                  
 14364 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14365 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14366                                  
 14367                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14368                                  ; expensive verification.
 14369                                  
 14370 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14371 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14372 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14373 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14374 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14375 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14376 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14377                                  checklatchret:				
 14378 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14379                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14380 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14381 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14382                                  checkret:				
 14383 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14385                                  
 14386                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14387                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14388                                  ;
 14389                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14390                                  
 14391                                  checkfatvid:				
 14392 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14393 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14394 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14395                                  
 14396                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14397                                  
 14398                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14399                                  
 14400                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14401                                  
 14402                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14403                                  ;
 14404                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14405                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14406                                  ;
 14407                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14410                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14411                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14412                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14413                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14414                                  ;
 14415                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14416                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14417                                  ; routine.)
 14418                                  ;
 14419                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14420                                  
 14421                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14422                                  check_vid:
 14423                                  
 14424                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14425                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14426                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14427                                  
 14428 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14429                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14430                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14431 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14432 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14433 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14434 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14435 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14436                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14437 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14438                                  					; if not fat system
 14439 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14440 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14441 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14442 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14443                                  					; definitely changed
 14444 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14445                                  
 14446 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14447                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14448 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14449                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14450                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14451                                  		;clc
 14452                                  checkfatret:				
 14453 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14455                                  
 14456                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14457                                  changed_drv:
 14458 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14459 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14460                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14461 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14463                                  
 14464                                  ; extended id check
 14465                                  
 14466                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14467                                  
 14468                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14469                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14470                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14471                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14472                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14473                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14474                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14475                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14476                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14477                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14478                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14479                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14480                                  ;
 14481                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14482                                  
 14483                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14484                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14485 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14486                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14487                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14488 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14489 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14490 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14491 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14492 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14493 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14494 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14495                                  					; don't know
 14496 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14497 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14498                                  					; reset the flag
 14499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14500                                  
 14501                                  ext_changed:				
 14502 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14503 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14504                                  					; disk changed!
 14505                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14506                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14507                                  		;clc
 14508 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14509                                  
 14510                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14511                                  
 14512                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14513                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14514                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14515                                  ;
 14516                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14517                                  
 14518                                  checkio:				
 14519 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14520 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14521 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14522 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14523 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14524 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14525 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14526 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14527 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14528 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14529 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14530 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14532                                  
 14533                                  checkioerr:				
 14534 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14535                                  
 14536                                  checkioret:				
 14537 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14538 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14540                                  
 14541                                  no_error_map:				
 14542 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14543                                  
 14544                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14545                                  
 14546                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14547                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14548                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14549                                  
 14550                                  returnvid:		
 14551 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14552                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14553 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14554 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14555 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14556 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14557                                  
 14558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14559                                  
 14560                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14561                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14562                                  ;
 14563                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14564                                  ; **trashes si**
 14565                                  
 14566                                  media_set_vid:				
 14567 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14568                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14569                                  
 14570                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14571                                  
 14572                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14573                                  
 14574                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14575                                  
 14576                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14577                                  vid_into_packet:
 14578 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14579 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14580 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14581 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14582 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14583 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14584 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14585                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14586 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14587                                  
 14588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14589                                  
 14590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14591                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14592                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14593                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14594                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14595                                  ;
 14596                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14597                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14598                                  ;
 14599                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14600                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14601                                  ;		carry set
 14602                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14603                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14604                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14605                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14606                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14607                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14608                                  ;
 14609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14610                                  
 14611                                  hidensity:
 14612                                  
 14613                                  ; check for correct drive
 14614                                  		
 14615                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14616 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14617                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14618                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14619 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14622                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14623                                  
 14624 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14625 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14626                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14627                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14628 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14629 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14630                                  
 14631                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14632                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14633                                  
 14634 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14635                                  					; ffOther
 14636 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14637 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14638                                  					; ff288
 14639 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14640 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14641 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14642                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14643                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14644 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14645                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14646                                  					; 2 sides
 14647 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14648                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14649                                  					; & head max
 14650 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14651 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14653                                  
 14654                                  Is720K:					
 14655 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14656 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14657                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14658                                  
 14659                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14660                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14661                                  		;retn
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14664                                  
 14665                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14666                                  
 14667                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14668                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14669                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14670                                  ;
 14671                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14672                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14673                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14674                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14675                                  ;
 14676                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14677                                  ;
 14678                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14679                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14680                                  
 14681                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14682 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14683 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14684                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14685                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14686 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14687                                  
 14688                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14689                                  
 14690                                  scan_bds:				
 14691 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14692 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14693                                  
 14694                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14695                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14696                                  
 14697 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14698                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14699                                  get_next_bds:				
 14700 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14701                                  					; go to	next bds
 14702 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14703 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14704 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14705 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14706 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14707                                  
 14708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14709                                  
 14710                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14711                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14712                                  ;
 14713                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14714                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14715                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14716                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14717                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14718                                  
 14719                                  checkromchange:	
 14720                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14721                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14722 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14723                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14724                                  					; fchanged
 14725 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14726                                  
 14727                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14728                                  
 14729                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14730                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14731                                  ;
 14732                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14733                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14734                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14735                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14736                                  
 14737                                  resetchanged:	
 14738                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14739                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14740 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14741                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14742                                  					; ~fchanged
 14743 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14744                                  
 14745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14746                                  
 14747                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14748                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14749                                  ;
 14750                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14751                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14752                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14753                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14754                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14755                                  
 14756                                  haschange:
 14757                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14758                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14759 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14760                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14761                                  					; fchangeline
 14762 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14763                                  
 14764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14765                                  
 14766                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14767                                  
 14768                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14769                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14770                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14771                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14772                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14773                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14774                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14775                                  
 14776                                  ; set_volume_id
 14777                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14778                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14779                                  ;
 14780                                  ;   on entry:
 14781                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14782                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14783                                  ;
 14784                                  ;   on exit:
 14785                                  ;	carry clear:
 14786                                  ;	   successful call
 14787                                  ;	carry set
 14788                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14789                                  
 14790                                  set_volume_id:				
 14791 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14792 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14793 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14794 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14795 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14796 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14797 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14798 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14799                                  setvret:				
 14800                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14801                                  		; cf = 0
 14802                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14803 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14804 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14805 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14807                                  
 14808                                  seterr:					
 14809 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14810 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14811 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14812                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14813 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14814                                  
 14815                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14816                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14817                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14818                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14819                                  
 14820                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14821                                  
 14822                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14823                                  
 14824                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14825                                  ;
 14826                                  ;   on entry:
 14827                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14828                                  ;
 14829                                  ;   on exit:
 14830                                  ;	carry clear
 14831                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14832                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14833                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14834                                  ;
 14835                                  ;	carry set:
 14836                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14837                                  
 14838                                  read_volume_id:
 14839 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14840 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14841 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14842 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14843 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14844 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14845 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14846 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14847 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14848 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14849 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14850 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14851 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14852 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14853 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14854                                  					; # of fats
 14855 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14856                                  					; sectors / fat
 14857 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14858 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14859                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14860                                  					;
 14861                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14862                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14863 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14864                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14865                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14866 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14867                                  					; # root dir entries
 14868 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14869 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14870 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14871                                  next_sec:				
 14872 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14873 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14874                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14875                                  					; get sector #
 14876 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14877                                  					; sectors / track
 14878 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14879 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14880                                  
 14881                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14882                                  
 14883 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14884                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14885 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14886 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14887 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14888                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14889 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14890 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14891 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14892                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14893 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14894 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14895 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14896                                  fvid_loop:				
 14897 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14898 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14899 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14900 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14901 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14902 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14903                                  ent_loop:				
 14904 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14905 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14906 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14907 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14908                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14909                                  					; next sector
 14910 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14911                                  notfound:				
 14912 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14913 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14915                                  
 14916                                  found_vid:				
 14917 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14918 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14919 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14920 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14921 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14922 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14923 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14924 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14925                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14926 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14927 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14928 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14929 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14930 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14931 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14932                                  fvid_ret:				
 14933 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14934                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14935                                  		; cf = 0
 14936                                  		;clc
 14937                                  rvidret:				
 14938 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14939 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14940 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14941 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14942                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14943                                  
 14944                                  no_vid:					
 14945 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14946 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14948                                  
 14949                                  readviderr:				
 14950 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14951 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14952 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14955                                  
 14956                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14957                                  ;
 14958                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14959                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14960                                  
 14961                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14962 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14963 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14964 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14965 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14966                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14967 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14968                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14969 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14970 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14971 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14972 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14973 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14974 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14975 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14976                                  
 14977                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14978                                  
 14979                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14980                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14981                                  ;
 14982                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14983                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14984                                  
 14985                                  check_volume_id:	
 14986 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14987 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14988 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14989                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14990 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14991                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14992 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14993 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14994 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14995 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14996 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14997 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14998                                  
 14999                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15000                                  
 15001                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15002                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15005                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15006                                  ;
 15007                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15008                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15009                                  ;
 15010                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15011                                  
 15012                                  fat_check:		
 15013 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 15014 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15015 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15016 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15017                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15018 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15019 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 15020                                  okret1:					
 15021 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 15022 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 15023                                  
 15024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15025                                  
 15026                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15027                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15028                                  
 15029                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15030                                  
 15031                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15032                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15033                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15034                                  
 15035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15036                                  
 15037                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15038                                  		;db 0
 15039                                  
 15040                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15041                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15042                                  
 15043                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15044 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15045                                  %endif
 15046                                  
 15047                                  ;align 16
 15048                                  
 15049                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15050                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15051                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15052                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15053                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15054                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 15061                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15104                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15105                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 15106                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15107                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 15108                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 15109                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 15110                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 15111                                  ;
 15112                                  ;
 15113                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 15114                                  ;
 15115                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 15116                                  ;
 15117                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 15118                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15119                                  ;
 15120                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 15121                                  ;
 15122                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 15123                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15124                                  ;
 15125                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 15126                                  ;
 15127                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 15128                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15129                                  ;value.
 15130                                  ;
 15131                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15132                                  ;
 15133                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15134                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15135                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15136                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15137                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15138                                  ;
 15139                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15140                                  ;
 15141                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15142                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15143                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15144                                  ;
 15145                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15146                                  ;
 15147                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15148                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15149                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15150                                  ;
 15151                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15152                                  ;
 15153                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15154                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15155                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15156                                  ;
 15157                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15158                                  ;
 15159                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15160                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15161                                  ;
 15162                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15163                                  ;
 15164                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15165                                  ;
 15166                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15167                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15168                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15169                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15170                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15171                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15172                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15173                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15174                                  ;memory.
 15175                                  ;NOTES:
 15176                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15177                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15178                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15179                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15180                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15181                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15182                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15183                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15184                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15185                                  
 15186                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15187                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15188                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15189                                  
 15190                                  ;include version.inc
 15191                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15192                                  
 15193                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15194                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15195                                  
 15196                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15197                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15198                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15199                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15200                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15201                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15202                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15203                                  
 15204                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15205                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15206                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15207                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15208                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15209                                  
 15210                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15211                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15212                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15213                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15214                                  
 15215                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15216                                  
 15217                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15218                                  				; currently 0.
 15219                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15220                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15221                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ;      if1
 15224                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15225                                  ;      endif
 15226                                  
 15227                                         ;******************************
 15228                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15229                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15230                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15231                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15232                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15233                                         ;******************************
 15234                                  
 15235                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15236                                  ; device definitions
 15237                                  
 15238                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15239                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15240                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15241                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15242                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15243                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15244                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15245                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15246                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15247                                  
 15248                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15249                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15250 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15251 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15252 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15253 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15254 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15255                                  .size:
 15256                                  endstruc
 15257                                  
 15258                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15259                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15260 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15261 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15262 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15263 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15264 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15265                                  .size:
 15266                                  endstruc
 15267                                  
 15268                                  ;Status word masks
 15269                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15270                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15271                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15272                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15273                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15274                                  
 15275                                  ;Function codes
 15276                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15277                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15278                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15279                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15280                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15281                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15282                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15283                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15284                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15285                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15286                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15287                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15288                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15289                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15290                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15291                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15292                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 15293                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 15294                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 15295                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
 15296                                  
 15297                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15298                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15299 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15300 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15301 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15302 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15303 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15304 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15305                                                          ; word
 15306 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15307 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15308 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15309 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15310                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15311                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15312                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15313                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15314                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15315                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15316                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15317                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15318 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15319 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15320 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15321 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15322 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15323 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15324                                  .size:
 15325                                  endstruc

 15327                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15328                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 15329                                  
 15330                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 15331                                  
 15332                                  struc buffinfo
 15333 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 15334 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 15335 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15336                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 15337                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 15338 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 15339                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 15340                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 15341                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 15342                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 15343                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 15344                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 15345                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 15346                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 15347 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15348                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 15349 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 15350 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 15351 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 15352 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 15353 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 15354                                  .size:
 15355                                  endstruc
 15356                                  
 15357                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 15358                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 15359                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 15360                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 15361                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 15362                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 15363                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 15364                                  
 15365                                  bufinsiz	equ	buffinfo.size ; ; Size of structure in bytes
 15366                                  
 15367                                  
 15368                                  buf_Free	equ	0FFh		; buf_id of free buffer
 15369                                  
 15370                                  ;Flag byte masks
 15371                                  buf_isnet	EQU	10000000B
 15372                                  buf_dirty	EQU	01000000B
 15373                                  ;***
 15374                                  buf_visit	EQU	00100000B
 15375                                  ;***
 15376                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B
 15377                                  
 15378                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 15379                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 15380                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 15381                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 15382                                  
 15383                                  buf_NetID	EQU	bufinsiz
