 30422                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30423                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30424                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30425                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30427                                  
 30428                                  bf10:	
 30429                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30430                                  	jz	short bf30
 30431                                  
 30432                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30433                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30434                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30435                                  
 30436                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30437                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30438                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30439                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30440                                  
 30441                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30442                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30443                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30444                                  
 30445                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30446                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30447                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30448                                  
 30449                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30450                                  	mov     ax,es
 30451                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30452                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30453                                  	inc     ax
 30454                                  	mov     es,ax
 30455                                  
 30456                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30457                                  
 30458                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30459                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30460                                  	or	bx,bx
 30461                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30462                                  bfE:	
 30463                                  	stc
 30464                                  bfX:
 30465                                  	pop	cx
 30466                                  	pop	bx
 30467                                  	retn
 30468                                  
 30469                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30470                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30471                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30472                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30473                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30474                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30475                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30476                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30477                                  
 30478                                  isSpecified:
 30479                                  	push	ax
 30480                                  
 30481                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30482                                  	mov	bl,al
 30483                                  
 30484                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30485                                  	;
 30486                                  	;push	ds
 30487                                  	;push	cs
 30488                                  	;pop	ds
 30489                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30490                                  	;pop	ds
 30491                                  	
 30492                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30493                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30494                                  
 30495                                  	pop	ax
 30496                                  	retn
 30497                                  
 30498                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30499                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30500                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30501                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30502                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30503                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30504                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30505                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30506                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30507                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30508                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30509                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30510                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30512                                  
 30513                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30514                                  
 30515                                  shrinkMCB:
 30516                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30517                                  	push	bx
 30518                                  	push	cx
 30519                                  	push	es
 30520                                  
 30521                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30522                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30523                                  
 30524                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30525                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30526                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30527                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30528                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30529                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30530                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30531                                  
 30532                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30533                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30534                                  
 30535                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30536                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30537                                  
 30538                                  	add	ax,bx
 30539                                  	inc	ax
 30540                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30541                                  
 30542                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30543                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30544                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30545                                  	; ax > 0
 30546                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30547                                  
 30548                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30549                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30550                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30551                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30552                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30553                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30554                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30555                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30556                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30557                                  
 30558                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30559                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30560                                  
 30561                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30562                                  	; cf=0
 30563                                  	;clc
 30564                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30565                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30566                                  smE:	
 30567                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30568                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30569                                  	;stc
 30570                                  smX:	
 30571                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30572                                  	pop	es
 30573                                  	pop	cx
 30574                                  	pop	bx
 30575                                  	retn
 30576                                  
 30577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30578                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30579                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30580                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30581                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30582                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30583                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30584                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30585                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30586                                  ;
 30587                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30588                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30589                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30590                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30591                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30592                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30593                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30594                                  ;       Endif
 30595                                  ;    Endif
 30596                                  ; Endif
 30597                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30598                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30599                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30600                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30601                                  ;    ENDIF
 30602                                  ; ENDIF
 30603                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30604                                  
 30605                                  _hideUMB_:
 30606                                  	push	bx
 30607                                  	push	dx
 30608                                  	push	es
 30609                                  
 30610                                  	mov	al,cl
 30611                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30612                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30613                                  
 30614                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30615                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30616                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30617                                  
 30618                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30619                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30620                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30621                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30622                                  
 30623                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30624                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30625                                  
 30626                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30627                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30628                                  
 30629                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30630                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30631                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30632                                  hu_10:	
 30633                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30634                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30635                                  
 30636                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30637                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30638                                  
 30639                                  	mov	dx,es
 30640                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30641                                  
 30642                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30643                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30644                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30645                                  
 30646                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30647                                  hu_30:	
 30648                                  	mov	al,cl
 30649                                  
 30650                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30651                                  
 30652                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30653                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30654                                  
 30655                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30656                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30657                                  hu_X:	
 30658                                  	pop	es
 30659                                  	pop	dx
 30660                                  	pop	bx
 30661                                  	retn
 30662                                  
 30663                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30664                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30665                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30666                                  ; Entry:  None
 30667                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30668                                  ; Error:  None
 30669                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30671                                  
 30672                                  UnFreeze:
 30673                                  	push	ax
 30674                                  	push	es
 30675                                  
 30676                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30677                                  	jc	short ufX
 30678                                  
 30679                                  	mov	es,ax
 30680                                  
 30681                                  ; ------------------------------
 30682                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30683                                  ; ------------------------------
 30684                                  
 30685                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30686                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30687                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30688                                  uf20:	
 30689                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30690                                  
 30691                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30692                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30693                                  
 30694                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30695                                  	mov     ax,es
 30696                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30697                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30698                                  	inc     ax
 30699                                  	mov     es,ax
 30700                                  
 30701                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30702                                  ufX:	
 30703                                  	pop	es
 30704                                  	pop	ax
 30705                                  	retn
 30706                                  
 30707                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30708                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30709                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30710                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30711                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30712                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30713                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30715                                  
 30716                                  isFrozMCB:
 30717                                  	;push	ax
 30718                                  
 30719                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30720                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30721                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30722                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30723                                  
 30724                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30725                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30726                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30727                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30728                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30729                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30730                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30731                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30732                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30733                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30734                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30735                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30736                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30737                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30738                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30739                                  ifmX:	
 30740                                  	;pop	ax
 30741                                  	retn
 30742                                  
 30743                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30744                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30745                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30746                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30747                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30748                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30749                                  ; USES:     None
 30750                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30751                                  
 30752                                  frezMCB:
 30753                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30754                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30755                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30756                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30757                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30758                                  	retn
 30759                                  
 30760                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30761                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30762                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30763                                  ; Entry:  None
 30764                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30765                                  ; Error:  None
 30766                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30767                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30768                                  
 30769                                  FreezeUM:
 30770                                  	push	ax
 30771                                  	push	cx
 30772                                  	push	dx
 30773                                  	push	es
 30774                                  
 30775                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30776                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30777                                  
 30778                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30779                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30780                                  
 30781                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30782                                  	mov	es,ax
 30783                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30784                                  
 30785                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30786                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30787                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30788                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30789                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30790                                  
 30791                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30792                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30793                                  
 30794                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30795                                  fum20:	
 30796                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30797                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30798                                  
 30799                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30800                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30801                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30802                                  
 30803                                  	call	frezMCB
 30804                                  fum30:	
 30805                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30806                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30807                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30808                                  
 30809                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30810                                  	mov     ax,es
 30811                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30812                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30813                                  	inc     ax
 30814                                  	mov     es,ax
 30815                                  	
 30816                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30817                                  
 30818                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30819                                  	pop	dx
 30820                                  	pop	cx
 30821                                  	pop	ax
 30822                                  	retn
 30823                                  
 30824                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30825                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30826                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30827                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30828                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30829                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30830                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30831                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30832                                  
 30833                                  UmbTest:
 30834                                  	push	ax
 30835                                  	push	bx
 30836                                  	push	ds
 30837                                  	push	es
 30838                                  
 30839                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30840                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30841                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30842                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30843                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30844                                  
 30845                                  	pop	es
 30846                                  	pop	ds
 30847                                  	pop	bx
 30848                                  	pop	ax
 30849                                  	retn
 30850                                  
 30851                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30852                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30853                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30854                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30855                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30856                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30857                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30858                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30859                                  
 30860                                  WalkMem:
 30861                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30862                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30863                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30864                                  		   	
 30865                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30866                                  	int	21h
 30867                                  
 30868                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30869                                  	mov	es,ax
 30870                                  
 30871                                  ; ------------------------------
 30872                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30873                                  ; ------------------------------
 30874                                  
 30875                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30876                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30877                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30878                                  
 30879                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30880                                  
 30881                                  	mov     bx,es
 30882                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30883                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30884                                  	inc     bx
 30885                                  	mov     es,bx
 30886                                  		
 30887                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30888                                  um20:	
 30889                                  	mov	ax,es
 30890                                  
 30891                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30892                                  
 30893                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30894                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30895                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30896                                  	retn
 30897                                  
 30898                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30899                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30900                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30901                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30902                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30903                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30904                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30905                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30906                                  
 30907                                  hl_unlink:
 30908                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30909                                  
 30910                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30911                                  	;
 30912                                  	;push	ds
 30913                                  	;push	cs
 30914                                  	;pop	ds
 30915                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30916                                  	;pop	ds
 30917                                  
 30918                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30919                                  
 30920                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30921                                  	int	21h
 30922                                  	retn
 30923                                  
 30924                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30925                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30926                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30927                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30928                                  
 30929                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30930                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30931                                  
 30932                                  ;   Modification log:
 30933                                  ;
 30934                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30935                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30936                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30937                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30938                                  
 30939                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30940                                  
 30941                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30942                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30943                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30944                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30945                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30946                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30947                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30948                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30949                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30950                                  
 30951                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30952                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30953                                  
 30954                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30955                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30956                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30957                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30958                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30959                                  ;    every command execution.
 30960                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30961                                  
 30962                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30963                                  	;
 30964                                  	;push	ds
 30965                                  	;push	cs
 30966                                  	;pop	ds
 30967                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30968                                  	;pop	ds	
 30969                                  
 30970                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30971                                  
 30972                                  	or	al,al
 30973                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30974                                  
 30975                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30976                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30977                                  	retn			; that.
 30978                                  uhu10:	
 30979                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30980                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30981                                  
 30982                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30983                                  	;
 30984                                  	;push	es
 30985                                  	;push	cs
 30986                                  	;pop	es
 30987                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30988                                  	;pop	ds	
 30989                                  
 30990                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30991                                  
 30992                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30993                                  
 30994                                  	pop	ax
 30995                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30996                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30997                                  	retn
 30998                                  
 30999                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31000                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31001                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31002                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31003                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31004                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31005                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31006                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31007                                  
 31008                                  he_unlink:
 31009                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31010                                  
 31011                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31012                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31013                                  
 31014                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31015                                  	int	21h
 31016                                  	retn
 31017                                  
 31018                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31019                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31020                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31021                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31022                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31023                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31024                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31025                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31026                                  
 31027                                  FreeUMBs:
 31028                                  	push	ax
 31029                                  	push	es
 31030                                  
 31031                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31032                                  	jc	short fusX
 31033                                  
 31034                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31035                                  fus10:	
 31036                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31037                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31038                                  	call	freeMCB
 31039                                  fus20:	   
 31040                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31041                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31042                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31043                                  
 31044                                  	mov	ax,es
 31045                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31046                                  	inc	ax
 31047                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31048                                  
 31049                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31050                                  fusX:	
 31051                                  	pop	es
 31052                                  	pop	ax
 31053                                  	retn
 31054                                  
 31055                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31056                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31057                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31058                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31059                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31060                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31061                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31062                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31063                                  
 31064                                  isHideMCB:
 31065                                  	;push	ax
 31066                                  
 31067                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31068                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31069                                  
 31070                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31071                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31072                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31073                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31074                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31075                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31076                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31077                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31078                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31079                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31080                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31081                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31082                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31083                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31084                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31085                                  ihm_x:	
 31086                                  	;pop	ax
 31087                                  	retn
 31088                                  
 31089                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31090                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31091                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31092                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31093                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31094                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31095                                  ; USES:     AX
 31096                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31097                                  
 31098                                  freeMCB:
 31099                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31100                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31101                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31102                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31103                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31104                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31105                                  	retn
 31106                                  
 31107                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31108                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31109                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31110                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31111                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31112                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31113                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31115                                  
 31116                                  HeadUmb:
 31117                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31118                                  
 31119                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31120                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31121                                  	;push	es
 31122                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31123                                  
 31124                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31125                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31126                                  
 31127                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31128                                  	int	21h
 31129                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31130                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31131                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31132                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31133                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31134                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31135                                  
 31136                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31137                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31138                                  xhu_e:	
 31139                                  	;stc
 31140                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31141                                  xhu_x:	
 31142                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31143                                  	;pop	es	
 31144                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31145                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31146                                  	retn
 31147                                  
 31148                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31149                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31150                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31151                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31152                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31153                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31154                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  
 31157                                  linkumb:
 31158                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31159                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31160                                  
 31161                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31162                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31163                                  
 31164                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31165                                  	mov	bx,1
 31166                                  	int	21h
 31167                                  lumbX:
 31168                                  	retn
 31169                                  
 31170                                  %endif

 31172                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31173                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31174                                  
 31175                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31176                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31177                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31178                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31179                                  
 31180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  ;
 31182                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31183                                  ;
 31184                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31185                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31186                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31187                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31188                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31189                                  ;
 31190                                  ;	Output : none
 31191                                  ;
 31192                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31193                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31194                                  ;
 31195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31196                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31197                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31198                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31199                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31200                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31201                                  
 31202                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31203                                  InitDevLoad:
 31204                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31205                                  	; ds = cs
 31206 000027DC 803E[CB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31207                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31208                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31209 000027E1 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31210                                  
 31211                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31212                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31213                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31214                                  ;
 31215                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31216                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31217                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31218                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31219                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31220                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31221                                  ;
 31222                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31223                                  ;
 31224                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31225                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31226                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31227                                  ;	pushf
 31228                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31229                                  ;	popf
 31230                                  ;
 31231                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31232                                  ;
 31233                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31234                                  
 31235                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31236                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31237                                  InitForConv:
 31238                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31239                                  	; ds = cs
 31240 000027E3 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31241                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31242 000027E6 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31243 000027E8 E84D04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31244 000027EB E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31245 000027EE 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31246                                  					;  in low memory
 31247                                  InitForHi:
 31248                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31249                                  	; ds = cs
 31250                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31251                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31252                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31253 000027F0 A1[C11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31254 000027F3 8B16[BD1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31255 000027F7 0316[BF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31256 000027FB EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31257                                  
 31258                                  InitForLo:
 31259                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31260                                  	; ds = cs
 31261                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31262 000027FD C606[CB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31263                                  initforlo_x:
 31264                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31265                                  	; ds = cs
 31266                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31267                                  					;  we are loading low
 31268                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31269                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31270 00002802 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31271 00002805 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31272                                  idl1:
 31273 00002809 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31274                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31275                                  	; ds = cs
 31276                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31277                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31278                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31279                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31280 0000280C A3[B01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31281 0000280F 8916[B21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31282 00002813 C706[B41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31283 00002819 A3[B61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31284 0000281C C3                      	retn
 31285                                  
 31286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31287                                  ;
 31288                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31289                                  ;
 31290                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31291                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31292                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31293                                  ;		   current UMB
 31294                                  ;
 31295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31296                                  
 31297                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31298                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31299                                  	; ds = cs
 31300                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31301                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31302                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31303 0000281D A1[BF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31304 00002820 0306[BD1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31305 00002824 2B06[C11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31306                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31307                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31308                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31309                                  	;stc
 31310                                  	;retn
 31311                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31312 00002828 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31313 0000282B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31314                                  spcinumb1:
 31315 0000282D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31316                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31317                                  	; ds = cs
 31318 0000282E 3B06[AE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31319                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31320                                  spcinumb2:
 31321 00002832 C3                      	retn
 31322                                  
 31323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31324                                  ;
 31325                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31326                                  ;
 31327                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31328                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31329                                  ;
 31330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31331                                  
 31332                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31333                                  ;
 31334                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31335                                  ;	push	ds
 31336                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31337                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31338                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31339                                  ;	pop	ds
 31340                                  ;
 31341                                  ;	inc	ax
 31342                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31343                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31344                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31345                                  ;	retn
 31346                                  
 31347                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31348                                  ;
 31349                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31350                                  ;
 31351                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31352                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31353                                  ;		 the device.
 31354                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31355                                  ;
 31356                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31357                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31358                                  ;	UMB.
 31359                                  ;
 31360                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31361                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31362                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31363                                  ;
 31364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31365                                  
 31366                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31367                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31368                                  
 31369                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31370                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31371                                  	; ds = cs
 31372 00002833 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31373 00002836 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31374 00002839 CD21                    	int	21h
 31375                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31376                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31377                                  
 31378 0000283B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31379 0000283D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31380                                  
 31381 0000283F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31382                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31383                                  	; ds = cs
 31384 00002840 391E[AE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31385                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31386 00002844 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31387 00002846 43                      	inc	bx
 31388                                  
 31389 00002847 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31390 0000284A CD21                    	int	21h
 31391 0000284C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31392                                  
 31393                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31394                                  	;dec	ax
 31395                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31396                                  	;
 31397                                  PrepareMark:
 31398 0000284E 1E                      	push	ds
 31399 0000284F 48                      	dec	ax
 31400 00002850 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31401 00002852 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31402 00002858 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31403 0000285E 40                      	inc	ax
 31404 0000285F 1F                      	pop	ds
 31405                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31406                                  	; ds = cs
 31407                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31408                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31409                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31410 00002860 891E[BF1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31411 00002864 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31412 00002867 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31413                                  	;
 31414                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31415                                  	; cf=0
 31416                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31417 0000286A C3                      	retn
 31418                                  gufd_err:
 31419 0000286B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31420                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31421                                  	; ds = cs
 31422                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31423                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31424                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31425 0000286D A3[BF1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31426 00002870 A3[BD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31427 00002873 A3[C11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31428 00002876 F9                      	stc
 31429 00002877 C3                      	retn
 31430                                  
 31431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31432                                  ;
 31433                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31434                                  ;
 31435                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31436                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31437                                  ;
 31438                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31439                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31440                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31441                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31442                                  ;
 31443                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31444                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31445                                  ;
 31446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31447                                  
 31448                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31449                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31450                                  
 31451                                  DevSetMark:
 31452 00002878 06                      	push	es
 31453 00002879 57                      	push	di
 31454 0000287A 1E                      	push	ds
 31455 0000287B 56                      	push	si
 31456 0000287C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31457 0000287E 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31458 00002884 40                      	inc	ax
 31459 00002885 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31460                                  
 31461                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31462                                  
 31463 00002889 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31464 0000288A 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31465                                  
 31466 0000288F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31467 00002891 FC                      	cld
 31468                                  dsm_again:
 31469 00002892 AC                      	lodsb
 31470 00002893 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31471 00002895 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31472 00002897 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31473 00002899 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31474                                  isit_slash:
 31475 0000289B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31476 0000289D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31477 0000289F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31478 000028A1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31479                                  isit_null:
 31480 000028A3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31481 000028A5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31482 000028A7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31483                                  
 31484 000028A9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31485 000028AC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31486                                  dsm_next_char:
 31487 000028AF AC                      	lodsb
 31488 000028B0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31489 000028B2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31490 000028B4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31491 000028B6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31492 000028B8 AA                      	stosb
 31493 000028B9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31494                                  blankout:
 31495 000028BB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31496 000028BD B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31497 000028BF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31498                                  dsm_exit:
 31499 000028C1 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31500 000028C2 5E                      	pop	si
 31501 000028C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31502 000028C4 5F                      	pop	di
 31503 000028C5 07                      	pop	es
 31504 000028C6 C3                      	retn
 31505                                  
 31506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31507                                  ;
 31508                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31509                                  ;
 31510                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31511                                  ;
 31512                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31513                                  ;
 31514                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31515                                  ;	in DevSize
 31516                                  ;
 31517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31518                                  
 31519                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31520                                  SizeDevice:
 31521                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31522                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31523 000028C7 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31524 000028C8 06                      	push	es
 31525 000028C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 31526 000028CA 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31527 000028CC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31528 000028CF CD21                    	int	21h
 31529 000028D1 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31530                                  
 31531 000028D3 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31532 000028D5 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31533 000028D8 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31534 000028DA 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31535 000028DC CD21                    	int	21h
 31536 000028DE 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31537 000028E0 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31538 000028E3 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31539 000028E6 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31540 000028EA 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31541 000028EC 2EC706[AE1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31542                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31543 000028F3 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31544                                  szdev1:
 31545 000028F5 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31546 000028F7 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31547 000028F9 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31548 000028FB D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31549 000028FD 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31550                                  	;
 31551                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31552 000028FF 2E3B06[CC1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31553                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31554                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31555 00002904 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31556                                  
 31557 00002906 2EA1[CC1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31558                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31559 0000290A F8                      	clc
 31560                                  szdev2:
 31561 0000290B 2EA3[AE1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31562                                  
 31563                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31564                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31565                                  	; cf=0
 31566                                  	;clc
 31567                                  sd_close:
 31568 0000290F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31569                                  					;  carry flag
 31570 00002910 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31571 00002913 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31572 00002915 9D                      	popf
 31573                                  sd_err:
 31574                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31575                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31576 00002916 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31577 00002917 C3                      	retn
 31578                                  
 31579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31580                                  ;
 31581                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 31582                                  ;
 31583                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 31584                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 31585                                  ;
 31586                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 31587                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 31588                                  ;
 31589                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 31590                                  ;
 31591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31592

 31594                                  ExecDev:
