 31889                                  ;
 31890                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31891                                  ;
 31892                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31893                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31894                                  ;
 31895                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31896                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31897                                  ;
 31898                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31899                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31900                                  ;
 31901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31902                                  
 31903                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31904                                  
 31905                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31906                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31907                                  GetHexNum:
 31908 000029FB 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31909 000029FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31910                                  ghn_next:
 31911 000029FF 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31912 00002A02 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31913 00002A05 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31914 00002A07 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31915 00002A0A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31916 00002A0C 50                      	push	ax
 31917 00002A0D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31918 00002A0F E83306                  	call	delim
 31919 00002A12 58                      	pop	ax
 31920                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31921 00002A13 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31922 00002A16 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31923 00002A18 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31924                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31925                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31926 00002A1B 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31927                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31928                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31929                                  ghn_shift1:
 31930 00002A1D D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31931 00002A1F D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31932 00002A21 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31933 00002A23 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31934 00002A25 46                      	inc	si
 31935 00002A26 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31936                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31937 00002A28 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31938 00002A2B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31939 00002A2E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31940 00002A32 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31941                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31942                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31943                                  ghn_shift2:
 31944 00002A34 F8                      	clc
 31945 00002A35 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31946 00002A37 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31947 00002A39 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31948 00002A3B F8                      	clc
 31949 00002A3C C3                      	retn
 31950                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31951                                  ghn_err:
 31952                                  gnib_err:
 31953 00002A3D F9                      	stc
 31954                                  ghn_ret:
 31955                                  gnib_ret:
 31956 00002A3E C3                      	retn

 31986 00002A57 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 32077                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32082                                  ;
 32083                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32084                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32085                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32086                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32087                                  ;				NC
 32088                                  ;			  else 
 32089                                  ;				CY
 32090                                  ;
 32091                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32092                                  ;
 32093                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32094                                  
 32095                                  umb_allocate:
 32096                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32097                                  	; ds = cs
 32098 00002A9C 50                      	push	ax
 32099 00002A9D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32100 00002A9F BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32101                                  					;   possible
 32102                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32103 00002AA2 FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32104                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32105                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32106                                  					; the largest UMB
 32107 00002AA6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32108 00002AA8 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32109                                  	
 32110 00002AAA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32111                                  
 32112                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32113 00002AAC FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32114                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32115                                  
 32116 00002AB0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32117                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32118                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32119 00002AB3 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32120                                  ua_err:
 32121 00002AB5 F9                      	stc	
 32122                                  
 32123                                  	;clc
 32124                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32125                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32126                                  	; cf=0
 32127                                  	;clc 
 32128                                  ua_done:
 32129 00002AB6 58                      	pop	ax
 32130 00002AB7 C3                      	retn
 32131                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32132                                  ;ua_err:
 32133                                  	;stc
 32134                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 32135                                  
 32136                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32137                                  ;
 32138                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32139                                  ;
 32140                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32141                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32142                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32143                                  ;			; DS = data
 32144                                  ;
 32145                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32148                                  ;
 32149                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32150                                  
 32151                                  umb_insert:
 32152 00002AB8 1E                      	push	ds
 32153                                  
 32154                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32155                                  	; ds = cs
 32156                                  
 32157                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32158 00002AB9 8E1E[DA1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32159                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32160 00002ABD 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32161 00002AC1 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32162 00002AC3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32163                                  ui_next:
 32164 00002AC5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32165                                  					;    new block
 32166 00002AC7 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32167                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32168                                  					;    last
 32169 00002AC9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32170 00002ACF 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32171                                  					; N: get next block
 32172 00002AD1 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32173                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32174 00002AD3 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32175 00002AD6 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32176                                  
 32177                                  ui_insert:
 32178 00002AD8 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32179 00002ADA 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32180                                  
 32181 00002ADB 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32182 00002ADD F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32183                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32184 00002ADF C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32185                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32186 00002AE4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32187                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32188 00002AEA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32189                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32190 00002AEE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32191                                  
 32192                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32193                                  
 32194 00002AF4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32195 00002AF6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32196 00002AFC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32197                                  					; mark as free
 32198 00002B03 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32199                                  					; start & end of new block
 32200 00002B06 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32201                                  
 32202                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32203                                  	
 32204 00002B0B 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32205 00002B0D 43                      	inc	bx
 32206 00002B0E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32207 00002B10 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32208                                  
 32209                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32210                                  					; this block
 32211 00002B11 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32212                                  	
 32213 00002B13 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32214 00002B19 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32215 00002B20 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32216 00002B24 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32217                                  
 32218 00002B2B EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32219                                  
 32220                                  ui_append:
 32221                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32222 00002B2D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32223 00002B32 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32224                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32225                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32226                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32227 00002B38 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32228                                  
 32229 00002B3E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32230 00002B40 40                      	inc	ax
 32231 00002B41 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32232                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32233 00002B43 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32234                                  
 32235 00002B45 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32236                                  
 32237 00002B47 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32238 00002B4D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32239 00002B54 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32240 00002B58 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32241                                  
 32242                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32243 00002B5F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32244 00002B61 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32245 00002B67 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32246                                  					; mark as free
 32247 00002B6E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32248 00002B6F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32249                                  ui_done:
 32250                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32251 00002B74 1F                      	pop	ds
 32252                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32253                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32254 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 32255                                  
 32256                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32257                                  
 32258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32259                                  ;
 32260                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32261                                  ;
 32262                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32263                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32264                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32265                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32266                                  ;
 32267                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32268                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32269                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32270                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32271                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32272                                  ;
 32273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32274                                  
 32275                                  umb_coalesce:
 32276                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32277                                  	; ds = cs
 32278 00002B76 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32279                                  
 32280 00002B77 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32281                                  
 32282                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32283                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32284 00002B79 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32285 00002B7D 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32286                                  uc_nextfree:
 32287 00002B82 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32288 00002B84 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32289                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32290 00002B86 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32291 00002B8B 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32292                                  					; N: get next arena
 32293 00002B8D E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32294 00002B90 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32295 00002B92 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32296                                  uc_again:
 32297 00002B94 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32298 00002B97 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32299                                  uc_check:
 32300 00002B99 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32301 00002B9E 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32302                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32303 00002BA0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32304 00002BA5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32305                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32306 00002BA6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32307 00002BAA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32308 00002BAD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32309 00002BAF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32310                                  
 32311                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32312                                  ;uc_done:
 32313                                  	;retn
 32314                                  
 32315                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32316                                  ;
 32317                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32318                                  ;
 32319                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32320                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32321                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32322                                  ;
 32323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32324                                  
 32325                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32326                                  get_next:
 32327 00002BB1 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32328 00002BB6 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32329                                  _get_next_:
 32330 00002BB8 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32331 00002BBA 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32332 00002BBE 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32333 00002BBF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32334                                  	;clc
 32335                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32336                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32337                                  	; cf=0
 32338                                  	;clc
 32339 00002BC1 C3                      	retn
 32340                                  gn_err:
 32341 00002BC2 F9                      	stc
 32342                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32343                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32344 00002BC3 C3                      	retn

 32346                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32347                                  ;
 32348                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32349                                  ;
 32350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32351                                  
 32352                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32353                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32354                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32355                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32356                                  	; ds = cs
 32357 00002BC4 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32358 00002BC7 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32359                                  
 32360                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32361                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32362                                  
 32363                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32364                                  	; ds = cs
 32365                                  
 32366 00002BC9 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32367 00002BCB B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32368 00002BCD D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32369                                  
 32370 00002BCF 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32371 00002BD1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32372                                  
 32373 00002BD3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32374                                  
 32375 00002BD5 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32376 00002BD8 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32377                                  	
 32378 00002BDA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32379 00002BE0 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32380                                  					
 32381 00002BE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32382 00002BEB 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32383                                  
 32384                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32385                                  
 32386 00002BF2 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32387 00002BF4 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32388 00002BFA 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32389                                  					; mark as free 
 32390 00002C01 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32391 00002C02 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32392                                  
 32393                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32394                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32395 00002C07 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32396 00002C0B BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32397 00002C0E 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32398                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32399                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32400                                  
 32401                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32402                                  
 32403 00002C11 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32404 00002C14 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32405 00002C17 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32406                                  ;scan_next
 32407                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32408                                  scannext:
 32409 00002C19 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32410 00002C1D 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32411                                  	
 32412 00002C1F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32413 00002C21 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32414 00002C26 40                      	inc	ax
 32415 00002C27 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32416                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32417                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32418 00002C29 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32419                                  got_last:
 32420 00002C2B 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32421 00002C31 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32422                                  	;clc
 32423                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32424                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32425                                  	; cf=0
 32426                                  	;clc
 32427 00002C37 C3                      	retn
 32428                                  
 32429                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32430                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32431                                  ;	;stc
 32432                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32433                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32434                                  ;	; cf=1
 32435                                  ;	;stc
 32436                                  ;	retn

 32438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32439                                  ;
 32440                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32441                                  ;
 32442                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32443                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32444                                  ;
 32445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32446                                  
 32447                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32448                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32449                                  	; ds = cs
 32450 00002C38 833E[BD1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32451                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32452 00002C3D 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32453 00002C3F 06                      	push	es
 32454 00002C40 53                      	push	bx
 32455                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32456                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32457                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32458                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32459 00002C41 8B1E[C11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32460 00002C45 2B1E[BD1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32461 00002C49 8E06[BD1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32462                                  	
 32463 00002C4D B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32464 00002C50 CD21                    	int	21h
 32465                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32466                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32467                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32468 00002C52 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32469 00002C54 48                      	dec	ax
 32470 00002C55 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32471 00002C57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32472 00002C5E 5B                      	pop	bx
 32473 00002C5F 07                      	pop	es
 32474                                  su_exit:
 32475 00002C60 C3                      	retn

 32479                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 32480                                  ;

 32484                                  
 32485                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32486                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32487                                  	; ds = cs
 32488 00002C61 1E                      	push	ds
 32489 00002C62 06                      	push	es
 32490                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32491 00002C63 803E[D91E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32492                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32493 00002C68 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32494                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32495 00002C6A 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32496                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32497 00002C6E 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32498 00002C73 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32499                                  ulu_next:
 32500 00002C78 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32501 00002C7B 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32502 00002C7D 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32503 00002C7F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32504 00002C81 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32505 00002C83 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32506                                  ulu_found:
 32507                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32508 00002C85 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32509                                  ulu_x:
 32510 00002C8A 07                      	pop	es
 32511 00002C8B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32512 00002C8C C3                      	retn

 32514                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32515                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32516                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32517                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32518                                  
 32519                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32520                                  ;
 32521                                  ; Summary:
 32522                                  ;
 32523                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32524                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32525                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32526                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32527                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32528                                  ;
 32529                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32530                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32531                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32532                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32533                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32534                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32535                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32536                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32537                                  ;
 32538                                  ; Example:
 32539                                  ;
 32540                                  ;   [menu]
 32541                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32542                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32543                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32544                                  ;
 32545                                  ;   [network]
 32546                                  ;   include misc
 32547                                  ;   device=foo
 32548                                  ;
 32549                                  ;   [misc]
 32550                                  ;   device=bar
 32551                                  ;   include alternate
 32552                                  ;
 32553                                  ;   [alternate]
 32554                                  ;   device=tar
 32555                                  ;
 32556                                  ;
 32557                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32558                                  ;
 32559                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32560                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32561                                  ;
 32562                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32563                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32564                                  ;   following order:
 32565                                  ;
 32566                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32567                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32568                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32569                                  ;
 32570                                  
 32571                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32572                                  
 32573                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32574                                  
 32575                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32576                                  
 32577                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32578                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32579                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32580                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32581                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32582                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32583                                  
 32584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32585                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32586                                  
 32587                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32588                                  
 32589                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32590                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32591                                  
 32592 00002C8D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32593                                  
 32594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32595                                  ;
 32596                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32597                                  ;
 32598                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32599                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32600                                  ;
 32601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32602                                  
 32603                                  setparms:
 32604 00002C8E 1E                      	push	ds
 32605 00002C8F 50                      	push	ax
 32606 00002C90 53                      	push	bx
 32607 00002C91 51                      	push	cx
 32608 00002C92 52                      	push	dx
 32609                                  
 32610 00002C93 0E                      	push	cs
 32611 00002C94 1F                      	pop	ds
 32612

 32728

 32763                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32764                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32780                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32781                                  ;
 32782                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32783                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32784                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32785                                  ; error.
 32786                                  ;

 32801

 32808 00002CFC F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32809                                  
 32810 00002CFE 07                      	pop	es
 32811 00002CFF 7532                    	jnz	short err_check

 32814 00002D04 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch

 32817 00002D0C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32818                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33038                                  ;
 33039                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33040                                  ;
 33041                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33042                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33043                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33044                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33045                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33046                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33047                                  ;
 33048                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33049                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33050                                  ;
 33051                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33052                                  ;
 33053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33054                                  
 33055                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33056                                  
 33057                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33058                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33059                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33060                                  	; ds = cs
 33061                                  	
 33062 00002DA9 06                      	push	es
 33063                                  
 33064 00002DAA 0E                      	push	cs
 33065 00002DAB 07                      	pop	es
 33066                                  
 33067 00002DAC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33068 00002DAE 8A1E[2F35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33069 00002DB2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33070 00002DB5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33071                                  
 33072 00002DB7 C706[3235]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33073                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33074                                  got_80:
 33075 00002DBD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33076 00002DBF 8BB7[D636]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33077                                  
 33078                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33079                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33080 00002DC3 BF[3535]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33081 00002DC6 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 33088

 33092 00002DD2 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 33093

 33095                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 33096 00002DD7 A3[4235]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 33097

 33102 00002DDF 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered

 33105                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 33106 00002DE4 A3[4435]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax

 33137

 33139                                  
 33140                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33141                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33142                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33143                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33144                                  
 33145                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33146                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33147                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33148

 33152 00002E09 7502                    	jne	short not_144m

 33155

 33157                                  
 33158                                  ;	check for 320K

 33552 00002F81 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 33553 00002F82 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 33554                                  
 33555                                  end_copy_file:
 33556 00002F84 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 33557 00002F89 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33558 00002F8B 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33559 00002F8D EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 33560                                  
 33561                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 33562 00002F8F E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 33563 00002F92 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33564                                  
 33565 00002F94 E86200                  	call	get2
 33566 00002F97 E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 33567 00002F9A 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 33568 00002F9C EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 33569                                  
 33570                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 33571 00002F9E E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 33572 00002FA1 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33573 00002FA3 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 33574                                  
 33575                                  org51:
 33576 00002FA6 AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 33577 00002FA7 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 33578 00002FA9 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 33579 00002FAB 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 33580 00002FAD 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 33581                                  					; M051 - Start
 33582                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33583                                  	; ds = cs
 33584 00002FAF 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 33585                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 33586 00002FB4 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33587 00002FB6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33588 00002FB8 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33589 00002FBA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33590 00002FBC 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33591 00002FBE 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33592 00002FC3 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33593 00002FC4 FE06[8D2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33594                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33595                                  					; inserted
 33596 00002FC8 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33597                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33598                                  
 33599 00002FCA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33600 00002FCC 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33601 00002FCE EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33602                                  
 33603                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33604                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33605                                  	; ds = cs
 33606 00002FD0 803E[8D2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33607                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33608 00002FD5 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 33609 00002FD7 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33610 00002FDC AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33611                                  					; M051 - End
 33612                                  org1_brdg:
 33613 00002FDD C606[8D2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33614                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33615                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33616 00002FE2 E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33617                                  
 33618                                  at_quote:
 33619 00002FE5 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33620                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33621 00002FEA 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33622                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33623 00002FEC C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33624 00002FF1 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33625                                  
 33626                                  up_level:
 33627                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 33628 00002FF3 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33629 00002FF7 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 33630                                  
 33631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33632                                  ;
 33633                                  ; procedure : get2
 33634                                  ;
 33635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33636                                  
 33637                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33638                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33639                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33640                                  get2:
 33641 00002FF9 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33642                                  	;
 33643                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33644                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33645                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33646 00002FFB 26                      	es	
 33647 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 33648                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33649                                  	;inc	si
 33650                                  	;
 33651 00002FFD 49                      	dec	cx
 33652 00002FFE C3                      	retn
 33653                                  noget:
 33654 00002FFF 59                      	pop	cx
 33655                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33656                                  	; ds = cs
 33657                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33658                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33659 00003000 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33660 00003004 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33661 00003008 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33662                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33663 0000300A 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33664                                  
 33665                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33666                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33667                                  ;;	retn
 33668                                  ;;else
 33669                                  ;
 33670                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33671                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33672                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33673                                  ;
 33674                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33675                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33676                                  ;;endif
 33677                                  
 33678                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33679 0000300E C3                      	retn
 33680                                  
 33681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33682                                  ;
 33683                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33684                                  ;
 33685                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33686                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33687                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33688                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33689                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33690                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33691                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33692                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33693                                  ;
 33694                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33695                                  
 33696                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33697                                  
 33698                                  skip_comment:
 33699 0000300F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33700                                  
 33701                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33702                                  	; ds = cs	
 33703                                  
 33704 00003011 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33705                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33706 00003016 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33707                                  
 33708 00003018 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33709                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33710 0000301D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33711                                  
 33712 0000301F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33713                                  	
 33714 00003022 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33715                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33716 00003026 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33717                                  
 33718 00003028 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33719                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33720 0000302D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33721                                  
 33722 0000302F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33723                                  	
 33724 00003033 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33725                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33726 00003037 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33727                                  skip_cmmt:
 33728 00003039 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33729 0000303B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33730 0000303E 46                      	inc	si
 33731 0000303F 49                      	dec	cx
 33732 00003040 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33733 00003042 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33734                                  no_commt:
 33735 00003044 C3                      	retn
 33736                                  
 33737                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33738                                  %if 0
 33739                                  
 33740                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33741                                  
 33742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33743                                  ;
 33744                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33745                                  ;
 33746                                  ;   INPUT
 33747                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33748                                  ;
 33749                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33750                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33751                                  ;
 33752                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33753                                  ;       All
 33754                                  ;
 33755                                  ;   HISTORY
 33756                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33757                                  ;
 33758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33759                                  
 33760                                  kbd_read:
 33761                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33762                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33763                                  
 33764                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33765                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33766                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33767                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33768                                  kbd_loop:
 33769                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33770                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33771                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33772                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33773                                          int     16h             ;
 33774                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33775                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33776                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33777                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33778                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33779                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33780                                  
 33781                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33782                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33783                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33784                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33785                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33786                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33787                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33788                                          int     16h             ;
 33789                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33790                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33791                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33792                                          inc     bx
 33793                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33794                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33795                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33796                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33797                                          int     16h             ;
 33798                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33799                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33800                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33801                                  
 33802                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33803                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33804                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33805                                  	
 33806                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33807                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33808                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33809                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33810                                          call    print
 33811                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33812                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33813                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33814                                  kbd_notf5:
 33815                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33816                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33817                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33818                                  
 33819                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33820                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33821                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33822                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33823                                          call    print           ;
 33824                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33825                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33826                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33827                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33828                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33829                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33830                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33831                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33832                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33833                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33834                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33835                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33836                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33837                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33838                                          retn			;
 33839                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33840                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33841                                          retn			;
 33842                                  
 33843                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33844                                  ;
 33845                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33846                                  ;
 33847                                  ;   INPUT
 33848                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33849                                  ;
 33850                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33851                                  ;       None
 33852                                  ;
 33853                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33854                                  ;       None
 33855                                  ;
 33856                                  ;   HISTORY
 33857                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33858                                  ;
 33859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33860                                  
 33861                                  set_numlock:
 33862                                          push    ax
 33863                                          push    ds
 33864                                          sub     ax,ax
 33865                                          mov     ds,ax
 33866                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33867                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33868                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33869                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33870                                          jmp     short set_done
 33871                                  not_off:
 33872                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33873                                          stc
 33874                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33875                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33876                                  set_done:
 33877                                          pop     ds
 33878                                          pop     ax
 33879                                          retn
 33880                                  
 33881                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33882                                  
 33883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33884                                  ;
 33885                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33886                                  ;
 33887                                  ;   INPUT
 33888                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33889                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33890                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33891                                  ;
 33892                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33893                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33894                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33895                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33896                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33897                                  ;
 33898                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33899                                  ;       All
 33900                                  ;
 33901                                  ;   NOTES
 33902                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33903                                  ;
 33904                                  ;   HISTORY
 33905                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33906                                  ;
 33907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33908                                  
 33909                                  menu_check:
 33910                                  
 33911                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33912                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33913                                  
 33914                                          push    cx              ;
 33915                                          push    si              ;
 33916                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33917                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33918                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33919                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33920                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33921                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33922                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33923                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33924                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33925                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33926                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33927                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33928                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33929                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33930                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33931                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33932                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33933                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33934                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33935                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33936                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33937                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33938                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33939                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33940                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33941                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33942                                          call    get_char        ;
 33943                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33944                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33945                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33946                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33947                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33948                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33949                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33950                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33951                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33952                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33953                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33954                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33955                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33956                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33957                                          pop     si              ;
 33958                                          pop     cx              ;
 33959                                  
 33960                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33961                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33962                                  
 33963                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33964                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33965                                  ;
 33966                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33967                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33968                                  ;
 33969                                          call    kbd_read
 33970                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33971                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33972                                  
 33973                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33974                                  
 33975                                  menu_search:
 33976                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33977                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33978                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33979                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33980                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33981                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33982                                  
 33983                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33984                                  
 33985                                  menu_color:
 33986                                          push    cx              ;
 33987                                          push    dx              ;
 33988                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33989                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33990                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33991                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33992                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33993                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33994                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33995                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33996                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33997                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33998                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33999                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34000                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34001                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34002                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34003                                  check_color:                    ;
 34004                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34005                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34006                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34007                                  set_color:
 34008                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34009                                          pop     dx              ;
 34010                                          pop     cx              ;
 34011                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34012                                  
 34013                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34014                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34015                                  
 34016                                  menu_found:
 34017                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34018                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34019                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34020                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34021                                  
 34022                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34023                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34024                                  
 34025                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34026                                  
 34027                                  menu_process:
 34028                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34029                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34030                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34031                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34032                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34033                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34034                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34035                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34036                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34037                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34038                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34039                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34040                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34041                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34042                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34043                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34044                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34045                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34046                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34047                                          stc                     ;
 34048                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34049                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34050                                  menu_numlock:
 34051                                          call    set_numlock
