 35083                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35084                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35085                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35086                                          jmp     short print1
 35087                                  not_up:
 35088                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35089                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35090                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35091                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35092                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35093                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35094                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35095                                  print1: 
 35096                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35097                                  print2: 
 35098                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35099                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35100                                  to_input_key:
 35101                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35102                                  not_down:
 35103                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35104                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35105                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35106                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35107                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35108                                          call    show_status     ;
 35109                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35110                                  not_f8:
 35111                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35112                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35113                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35114                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35115                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35116                                  
 35117                                  normal_key:
 35118                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35119                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35120                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35121                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35122                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35123                                          retn			;
 35124                                  not_backspace:
 35125                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35126                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35127                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35128                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35129                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35130                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35131                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35132                                          jmp	short print2
 35133                                  
 35134                                  select_done:
 35135                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35136                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35137                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35138                                  
 35139                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35140                                  
 35141                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35142                                  
 35143                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35144                                  ;
 35145                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35146                                  ;
 35147                                  ;   INPUT
 35148                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35149                                  ;
 35150                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35151                                  ;       None
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35154                                  ;       None
 35155                                  ;
 35156                                  ;   NOTES
 35157                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35158                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35159                                  ;
 35160                                  ;   HISTORY
 35161                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35162                                  ;
 35163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35164                                  
 35165                                  disp_input:
 35166                                          push    ax
 35167                                          cmp     al,' '
 35168                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35169                                          mov     al,' '
 35170                                  disp_ok:
 35171                                          mov     dl,al
 35172                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35173                                          int     21h
 35174                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35175                                          call    print
 35176                                          pop     ax
 35177                                          retn
 35178                                  
 35179                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35180                                  
 35181                                  disp_num:
 35182                                          push    bx
 35183                                          add     al,'0'
 35184                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35185                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35186                                          mov     cx,1
 35187                                          int     10h
 35188                                          pop     bx
 35189                                          retn
 35190                                  
 35191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35192                                  ;
 35193                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35194                                  ;
 35195                                  ;   INPUT
 35196                                  ;       None
 35197                                  ;
 35198                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35199                                  ;       None
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35202                                  ;       None
 35203                                  ;
 35204                                  ;   NOTES
 35205                                  ;       None
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ;   HISTORY
 35208                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35209                                  ;
 35210                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35211                                  
 35212                                  show_status:
 35213                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35214                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35215                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35216                                          int     10h             ;
 35217                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35218                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35219                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35220                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35221                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35222                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35223                                          int     10h             ;
 35224                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35225                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35226                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35227                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35228                                  show_onoff: 
 35229                                          int     10h
 35230                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35231                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35232                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35233                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35234                                  
 35235                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35236                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35237                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35238                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35239                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35240                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35241                                          int     10h             ;
 35242                                  show_done:                      ;
 35243                                          pop     dx              ;
 35244                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35245                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35246                                          pop     bx              ;
 35247                                          retn			;
 35248                                  
 35249                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35250                                  
 35251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35252                                  ;
 35253                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35254                                  ;
 35255                                  ;   INPUT
 35256                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35257                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35258                                  ;
 35259                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35260                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35261                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35262                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35263                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35264                                  ;
 35265                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35266                                  ;       AX
 35267                                  ;
 35268                                  ;   NOTES
 35269                                  ;       None
 35270                                  ;
 35271                                  ;   HISTORY
 35272                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35273                                  ;
 35274                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35275                                  
 35276                                  skip_token:
 35277                                          call    get_char
 35278                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35279                                          call    any_delim
 35280                                          jne	short skip_token
 35281                                  skip_check_eol:
 35282                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35283                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35284                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35285                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35286                                          clc
 35287                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35288                                  	retn
 35289                                  skip_token_eol:
 35290                                          stc
 35291                                  skip_token_done:
 35292                                          retn
 35293                                  
 35294                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35295                                  ;
 35296                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35297                                  ;
 35298                                  ;   INPUT
 35299                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35300                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35301                                  ;
 35302                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35303                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35304                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35305                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35306                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35307                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35308                                  ;
 35309                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35310                                  ;       AX
 35311                                  ;
 35312                                  ;   NOTES
 35313                                  ;       None
 35314                                  ;
 35315                                  ;   HISTORY
 35316                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35317                                  ;
 35318                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35319                                  
 35320                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35321                                          call    get_char        ;
 35322                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35323                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35324                                          call    delim           ;
 35325                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35326                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35327                                  
 35328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35329                                  ;
 35330                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35331                                  ;
 35332                                  ;   INPUT
 35333                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35334                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35335                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35336                                  ;
 35337                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35338                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35339                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35340                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35341                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35342                                  ;
 35343                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35344                                  ;       AX
 35345                                  ;
 35346                                  ;   NOTES
 35347                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35348                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35349                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35350                                  ;
 35351                                  ;   HISTORY
 35352                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35353                                  ;
 35354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35355                                  
 35356                                  skip_opt_line:
 35357                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35358                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35359                                       
 35360                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35361                                  
 35362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35363                                  ;
 35364                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35365                                  ;
 35366                                  ;   INPUT
 35367                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35368                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35369                                  ;
 35370                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35371                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35372                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35373                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35376                                  ;       AX
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;   NOTES
 35379                                  ;       None
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                  ;   HISTORY
 35382                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35383                                  ;
 35384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35385                                  
 35386                                  skip_line:
 35387                                          call    get_char
 35388                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35389                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35390                                          jne	short skip_line
 35391                                  skip_line_done:
 35392                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35393                                          retn
 35394                                  
 35395                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35398                                  ;
 35399                                  ;   INPUT
 35400                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35401                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35402                                  ;
 35403                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35404                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35405                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35406                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35407                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35408                                  ;
 35409                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35410                                  ;       AX
 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ;   NOTES
 35413                                  ;       None
 35414                                  ;
 35415                                  ;   HISTORY
 35416                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35417                                  ;
 35418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35419                                  
 35420                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35421                                  
 35422                                  get_number:
 35423                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35424                                  num_loop:
 35425                                          call    get_char        ;
 35426                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35427                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35428                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35429                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35430                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35431                                          push    ax              ;
 35432                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35433                                          push    dx              ;
 35434                                          mul     bx              ;
 35435                                          pop     dx              ;
 35436                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35437                                          pop     ax              ;
 35438                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35439                                          cbw                     ;
 35440                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35441                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35442                                  
 35443                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35444                                  ;num_done:
 35445                                          ;retn
 35446                                  
 35447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35448                                  ;
 35449                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35450                                  ;
 35451                                  ;   INPUT
 35452                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35453                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35454                                  ;
 35455                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35456                                  ;       AL == next character
 35457                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35458                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35459                                  ;
 35460                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35461                                  ;       AX
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   NOTES
 35464                                  ;       None
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   HISTORY
 35467                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35468                                  ;
 35469                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35470                                  
 35471                                  get_char:
 35472                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35473                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35474                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35475                                  	es	
 35476                                  	lodsb
 35477                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35478                                          retn			;
 35479                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35480                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35481                                  nearby_ret:
 35482                                          retn
 35483                                  
 35484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35485                                  ;
 35486                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35487                                  ;
 35488                                  ;   INPUT
 35489                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35490                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35491                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35492                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35493                                  ;
 35494                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35495                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35498                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   NOTES
 35501                                  ;       None
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   HISTORY
 35504                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35505                                  ;
 35506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35507                                  
 35508                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35509                                  query_user:
 35510                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35511                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35512                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35513                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35514                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35515                                  qu_1:
 35516                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35517                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35518                                          push    ax                      ;
 35519                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35520                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35521                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35522                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35523                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35524                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35525                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35526                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35527                                  query_all:
 35528                                  
 35529                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35530                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35531                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35532                                  
 35533                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35534                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35535                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35536                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35537                                  
 35538                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35539                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35540                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35541                                  find_match:                             ;
 35542                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35543                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35544                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35545                                          inc     di                      ;
 35546                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35547                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35548                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35549                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35550                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35551                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35552                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35553                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35554                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35555                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35556                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35557                                          inc     di                      ;
 35558                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35559                                          int     21h                     ;
 35560                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35561                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35562                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35563                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35564                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35565                                  cmd_notset:
 35566                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35567                                  line_print:                             ;
 35568                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35569                                          es
 35570                                  	lodsb
 35571                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35572                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35573                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35574                                  non_null:                               ;
 35575                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35576                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35577                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35578                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35579                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35580                                  non_space:                              ;
 35581                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35582                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35583                                          int     21h                     ;
 35584                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35585                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35586                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35587                                  
 35588                                  generic_prompt:
 35589                                          call    print                   ;
 35590                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35591                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35592                                          int     16h                     ;
 35593                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35594                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35595                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35596                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35597                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35598                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35599                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35600                                  not_func:
 35601                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35602                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35603                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35604                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35605                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35606                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35607                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35608                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35609                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35610                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35611                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35612                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35613                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35614                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35615                                  
 35616                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35617                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35618                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35619                                  	clc
 35620                                  do_cmd:
 35621                                  	pop     ax			;
 35622                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35623                                  	; cf=0
 35624                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35625                                  	retn
 35626                                  
 35627                                  skip_cmd:
 35628                                  	pop     ax			;
 35629                                  skip_all:
 35630                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35631                                  	stc
 35632                                  	retn
 35633                                  
 35634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35635                                  ;
 35636                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35637                                  ;
 35638                                  ;   INPUT
 35639                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35640                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35641                                  ;
 35642                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35643                                  ;       None
 35644                                  ;
 35645                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35646                                  ;       None
 35647                                  ;
 35648                                  ;   NOTES
 35649                                  ;       None
 35650                                  ;
 35651                                  ;   HISTORY
 35652                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35653                                  ;
 35654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35655                                  
 35656                                  print_error:
 35657                                          push    ax
 35658                                          push    bx
 35659                                          push    cx
 35660                                          push    dx
 35661                                          push    ds
 35662                                          push    cs
 35663                                          pop     ds
 35664                                          pushf
 35665                                          call    get_linenum
 35666                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35667                                          call    error_line
 35668                                          popf
 35669                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35670                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35671                                          call    print
 35672                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35673                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35674                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35675                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35676                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35677                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35678                                  pe_1:     
 35679                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35680                                          call    print
 35681                                  pe_ret: 
 35682                                  	pop     ds
 35683                                          pop     dx
 35684                                          pop     cx
 35685                                          pop     bx
 35686                                          pop     ax
 35687                                  	retn
 35688                                  
 35689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35690                                  
 35691                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35692                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35693                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35694                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35695                                  
 35696                                  disable_autoexec:
 35697                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35698                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35699                                  
 35700                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35701                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35702                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35703                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35704                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35705                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35706                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35707                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35708                                  dae_1:
 35709                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35710                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35711                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35712                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35713                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35714                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35715                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35716                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35717                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35718                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35719                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35720                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35721                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35722                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35723                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35724                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35725                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35726                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35727                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35728                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35729                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35730                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35731                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35732                                          retn
 35733                                  
 35734                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35735                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35736                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35737                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35738                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35739                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35740                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35741                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35742                                  
 35743                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35744                                  
 35745                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35746                                  
 35747                                  
 35748                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35749                                  
 35750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35751                                  ;
 35752                                  ; procedure : delim
 35753                                  ;
 35754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35755                                  
 35756                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35757                                  ;
 35758                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35759                                  ;
 35760                                  ;any_delim:
 35761                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35762                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35763                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35764                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35765                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35766                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35767                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35768                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35769                                  ;
 35770                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35771                                  
 35772                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35773                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35774                                  delim:
 35775 00003045 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35776 00003047 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35777                                  
 35778 00003049 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35779 0000304B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35780                                  
 35781                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35782 0000304D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35783 0000304F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35784 00003051 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35785 00003053 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35786 00003055 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35787 00003057 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35788 00003059 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35789 0000305B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35790 0000305D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35791                                  
 35792                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35793                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35794                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35795                                  ;	clc
 35796                                  ;;endif
 35797                                  
 35798                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35799                                  delim_ret:
 35800 0000305F C3                      	retn
 35801                                  
 35802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35803                                  ;
 35804                                  ; procedure : newline
 35805                                  ;
 35806                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35807                                  ;
 35808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35809                                  
 35810                                  newline:
 35811 00003060 E89CF6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35812 00003063 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35813 00003065 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35814 00003067 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35815 00003069 E893F6                  	call	getchr
 35816                                  nl_ret:
 35817 0000306C C3                      	retn
 35818

 35820                                  ; 
 35821                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35822                                  ;
 35823                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35824                                  
 35825                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35826                                  mapcase:
 35827 0000306D 51                      	push	cx
 35828 0000306E 56                      	push	si
 35829 0000306F 1E                      	push	ds
 35830                                  
 35831 00003070 06                      	push	es
 35832 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 35833                                  
 35834                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35835                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35836                                  ;
 35837                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35838                                  ;;else
 35839                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35840                                  ;;endif
 35841                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35842 00003072 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35843                                  
 35844                                  convloop:
 35845 00003074 AC                      	lodsb
 35846 00003075 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35847 00003077 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35848 00003079 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35849 0000307B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35850 0000307D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35851 0000307F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35852                                  noconv:
 35853                                  
 35854                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35855                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35856                                  ;;
 35857                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35858                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35859                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35860                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35861                                  ;;
 35862                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35863                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35864                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35865                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35866                                  ;check_eol:
 35867                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35868                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35869                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35870                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35871                                  ;;endif
 35872                                  	
 35873                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35874 00003082 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35875                                  convdone:
 35876 00003084 1F                      	pop	ds
 35877 00003085 5E                      	pop	si
 35878 00003086 59                      	pop	cx
 35879 00003087 C3                      	retn
 35880                                  
 35881                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35882                                  ;
 35883                                  ; procedure : round
 35884                                  ;
 35885                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35886                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35887                                  ;
 35888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35889                                  
 35890                                  round:
 35891 00003088 50                      	push	ax
 35892 00003089 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35893                                  
 35894 0000308D E830E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35895                                  
 35896 00003090 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35897 00003095 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35898 0000309C 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35899 000030A0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35900 000030A5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35901 000030A7 2EF606[3414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35902 000030AD 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35903 000030AF 06                      	push	es
 35904 000030B0 56                      	push	si
 35905 000030B1 2E8B36[3214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35906 000030B6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35907 000030B8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35908 000030BA 48                      	dec	ax
 35909                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35910 000030BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35911 000030BF 2E8026[3414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35912 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35913 000030C6 07                      	pop	es
 35914                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35915 000030C7 58                      	pop	ax
 35916                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35917                                  	; cf = 0
 35918                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35919                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35920 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 35921

 35929 000030CB BA[F137]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35932 000030CE E87602                  	call	print
 35933 000030D1 E97FD7                  	jmp	stall

 35957                                  ; procedure : todigit
 35958                                  ;
 35959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35960                                  
 35961                                  todigit:
 35962 000030F7 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 35963                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35964                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35965 000030F9 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35966                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35967                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35968                                  	;clc
 35969                                  	;retn
 35970                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35971 000030FB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 35972 000030FD F5                      	cmc
 35973                                  notdig:
 35974                                  	;stc
 35975                                  notdig2:
 35976 000030FE C3                      	retn

 35978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35979                                  ;
 35980                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35981                                  ;
 35982                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35983                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35984                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35987                                  
 35988                                  getnum:
 35989 000030FF 53                      	push	bx
 35990 00003100 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35991                                  b2:
 35992 00003102 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35993 00003105 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35994                                  
 35995 00003107 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35996 00003108 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35997                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35998                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35999 00003109 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36000 0000310B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36001 0000310D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36002 0000310E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36003 00003110 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36004 00003113 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36005                                  
 36006 00003115 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36007                                  
 36008 00003116 E8E6F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36009 00003119 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36010 0000311B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36011 0000311D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36012 0000311F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36013 00003121 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36014 00003123 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36015 00003125 7417                    	je	short b15
 36016 00003127 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36017 0000312C 7410                    	je	short b15
 36018 0000312E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36019                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36020                                  	;nop
 36021                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36022                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36023                                  	;nop
 36024                                  	;nop
 36025 00003130 740C                    	je	short b15
 36026 00003132 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36027 00003134 7408                    	je	short b15
 36028 00003136 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36029 00003138 7404                    	je	short b15
 36030 0000313A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36031 0000313C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36032                                  b15:
 36033 0000313E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36034 00003143 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36035                                  b1:
 36036 00003148 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36037 0000314A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36038 0000314C 5B                      	pop	bx
 36039 0000314D C3                      	retn
 36040                                  badnum:
 36041                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36042                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36043 0000314E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36044                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36045 00003150 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36046 00003154 5B                      	pop	bx
 36047 00003155 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36048 00003156 C3                      	retn
 36049                                  
 36050                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36051                                  
 36052                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36053                                  
 36054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36055                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36056                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36057                                  ;	si = 0
 36058                                  ;	ax = country id
 36059                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36060                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36061                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36064                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36065                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36066                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36068                                  
 36069 00003157 57                      	push	di
 36070 00003158 50                      	push	ax
 36071 00003159 52                      	push	dx
 36072                                  
 36073 0000315A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36074 0000315C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36075 0000315E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36076 00003161 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36077 00003164 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36078                                  
 36079 00003166 06                      	push	es
 36080 00003167 56                      	push	si
 36081                                  
 36082 00003168 0E                      	push	cs
 36083 00003169 07                      	pop	es
 36084                                  
 36085 0000316A BF[1334]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36086 0000316D B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36087 00003170 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36088                                  
 36089 00003172 5E                      	pop	si
 36090 00003173 07                      	pop	es
 36091 00003174 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36092                                  
 36093 00003176 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36094 00003179 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36095 0000317C 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36096                                  
 36097 0000317E 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36098 0000317F 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36099 00003181 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36100 00003184 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36101 00003187 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36102 0000318A 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36103                                  
 36104 0000318C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36105 0000318E 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36106 00003192 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36107                                  
 36108 00003194 46                      	inc	si
 36109 00003195 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36110 00003196 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36111 00003197 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36112 00003198 5F                      	pop	di
 36113                                  
 36114                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36115 00003199 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36116 0000319C 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36117                                  
 36118 0000319E 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36119 000031A1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36120 000031A3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36121 000031A6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36122                                  
 36123                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36124 000031A8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36125 000031AA 46                      	inc	si
 36126 000031AB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36127 000031AC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36128                                  
 36129 000031AE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36130                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36131 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 36132 000031B2 C3                      	retn
 36133                                  
 36134                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36135 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 36136 000031B4 59                      	pop	cx
 36137 000031B5 5F                      	pop	di
 36138 000031B6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36139                                  
 36140                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36141 000031B8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36142                                  
 36143                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36144 000031BB 2E8916[1B34]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36145 000031C0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36146 000031C3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36147 000031C6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36148 000031C9 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36149 000031CC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36150                                  
 36151 000031CE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36152 000031D0 46                      	inc	si
 36153 000031D1 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36154                                  
 36155                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36156 000031D2 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36157 000031D3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36158 000031D4 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36159                                  
 36160 000031D5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36161 000031D8 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36162 000031DB 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36163                                  
 36164 000031DD 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36165 000031E0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36166 000031E3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36167 000031E6 F9                      	stc
 36168 000031E7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36169 000031E9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36170                                  
 36171 000031EB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36172 000031EE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36173 000031F1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36174 000031F3 F9                      	stc
 36175 000031F4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36176 000031F6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36177                                  
 36178 000031F8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36179 000031FA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36180                                  
 36181 000031FC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36182 000031FF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36183 00003202 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36184 00003205 F9                      	stc
 36185 00003206 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36186 00003208 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36187                                  
 36188 0000320A 56                      	push	si
 36189 0000320B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36190 0000320E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36191 00003210 5E                      	pop	si
 36192 00003211 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36193 00003214 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36194 00003217 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36195 00003219 F9                      	stc
 36196 0000321A CD21                    	int	21h
 36197 0000321C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36198                                  
 36199 0000321E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36200 00003220 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36201                                  
 36202 00003222 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36203 00003225 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36204 00003228 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36205 0000322A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36206 0000322B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36207 0000322C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36208 00003230 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36209                                  
 36210                                  	;if	bugfix
 36211 00003232 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36212                                  	;endif
 36213                                  
 36214 00003235 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36215 00003237 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36216                                  
 36217 00003239 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36218                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36219 0000323D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36220                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36221

 36223                                  
 36224 00003242 50                      	push	ax
 36225 00003243 2EA1[1B34]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36226 00003247 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36227 0000324A 58                      	pop	ax
 36228                                  
 36229                                  setdoscntry_mov:
 36230 0000324B F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy the table into dos
 36231 0000324D 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?
 36232 0000324F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_data_next
 36233

 36235 00003252 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 36236                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 36237 00003256 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36238                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36239                                  
 36240                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 36241 0000325A 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 36242 0000325B 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 36243 0000325C 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 36244 0000325D 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36245 0000325F 46                      	inc	si
 36246 00003260 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36247 00003261 49                      	dec	cx

 36249 00003265 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36250 00003267 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36251

 36253                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:

 36263 0000326E 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?

 36265
